programme.desc: Based on the 2018 adaptation and staging of Ta-Nehisi Coates' book at the Apollo Theater, this HBO Special features powerful readings from the book with documentary and archival footage, and animation. Focusing on the author's experiences growing up in inner-city Baltimore, the narrative explores Coates' bold notion that American society structurally supports white supremacy.(n)

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: Hotshot Washington, D.C. lawyer Robert Dean learns the hard way that it's not paranoia if they're really after you. When he is given a video tying a National Security Agency official to a murder, Dean goes on the run and meets up with a mysterious surveillance expert who helps him turn the tables on corrupt NSA agents who are waging a ruthless campaign to destroy Dean's life and retrieve the video. Will Smith and Gene Hackman star in this "dynamite thriller" (Rolling Stone). Co-starring Jon Voight, Regina King, Loren Dean, Jake Busey, Barry Pepper and Gabriel Byrne. Directed by Tony Scott; written by David Marconi. (R) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: His Dark Materials 09: The City of Magpies
programme.desc: Season Two Premiere. Lyra and Will explore a new world. The Magisterium take action on past events. Lee Scoresby embarks on a mission.(n)

programme.title: His Dark Materials 10: The Cave
programme.desc: Lyra and Will head to Oxford for answers. The Magisterium is faced with a choice.(n)

programme.title: His Dark Materials 11: Theft
programme.desc: Lyra ignores the alethiometer's advice leading to dangerous consequences.(n)

programme.title: His Dark Materials 12: Tower of the Angels
programme.desc: Will and Lyra make a plan, unaware of the dangers or the cost involved.(n)

programme.title: Halwa
programme.desc: When Sujata gets an unexpected piece of news about her secret childhood sweetheart and best friend, Premila, she begins to rekindle the spark with the aid of a new Facebook account, but her abusive husband takes notice. Vee Kumari, Asit Vyas, Sanchita Malik, Aishveryaa Nidhi, Samiya Khan, Sonal Shah, Puja Gupta and Renu Razdan star. Directed by Gayatri Bajpai and Nirav Bhakta.(n)

programme.title: Harriet
programme.desc: The extraordinary true story of abolitionist Harriet Tubman is chronicled in this first-rate drama that details her life from her harrowing escape from slavery to her leading hundreds of slaves to freedom via the Underground Railroad. Cynthia Erivo (HBO's "The Outsider") earned Oscar(R) and Golden Globe(R) nominations for her moving performance as Harriet. Co-starring Leslie Odom Jr. and Janelle Monae. "A rousing and powerful drama" (The New York Times). Directed by Kasi Lemmons; screenplay by Gregory Allen Howard and Kasi Lemmons, story by Gregory Allen Howard.(n)

programme.title: Precious
programme.desc: An abused, illiterate, overweight and pregnant teen is offered a glimmer of hope to change her life by a teacher at an alternative school. Winner of two Oscars(R), this powerful drama stars Mo'Nique, Paula Patton, Mariah Carey, Sherri Shepherd, Lenny Kravitz and Gabourey Sidibe. Directed by Lee Daniels; screenplay by Geoffrey Fletcher, based on the novel "Push" by Sapphire.(n)

programme.title: Precious
programme.desc: An abused, illiterate, overweight and pregnant teen is offered a glimmer of hope to change her life by a teacher at an alternative school. Winner of two Oscars(R), this powerful drama stars Mo'Nique, Paula Patton, Mariah Carey, Sherri Shepherd, Lenny Kravitz and Gabourey Sidibe. Directed by Lee Daniels; screenplay by Geoffrey Fletcher, based on the novel "Push" by Sapphire.(n)

programme.title: The Comebacks
programme.desc: A floundering football coach seeks a final shot at success in this comedy that spoofs classic sports films. Lambeau Fields has earned many losses in his coaching days, but when an opportunity to lead an inept Texas team surfaces, he's ready to tackle the W's into his column! Lampooning memorable sports movies such as Rudy, Rocky and Remember the Titans this comedy about a motley group of inadequate athletes keeps the laughs coming from the kickoff. Starring David Koechner, Carl Weathers and Melora Hardin. Directed by Tom Brady; screenplay by Ed Yeager, Joey Gutierrez; story by John Aboud, Michael Colton, Adam Jay Epstein and Andrew Jacobson. (PG13) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: Natalie Portman stars as an astronaut whose transcendent experiences in space leave her unhappy with her dreary life on Earth as she starts to lose her grip on reality. Jon Hamm, Dan Stevens, Zazie Beetz, Pearl Amanda Dickson and Ellen Burstyn co-star in this drama inspired by real events. Directed by Noah Hawley; written by Brian C. Brown & Elliott DiGuiseppi and Noah Hawley.(n)

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: Natalie Portman stars as an astronaut whose transcendent experiences in space leave her unhappy with her dreary life on Earth as she starts to lose her grip on reality. Jon Hamm, Dan Stevens, Zazie Beetz, Pearl Amanda Dickson and Ellen Burstyn co-star in this drama inspired by real events. Directed by Noah Hawley; written by Brian C. Brown & Elliott DiGuiseppi and Noah Hawley.(n)

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Time is the ultimate currency in a dystopian future in which humans stop aging at 25--but die in a year unless they get more time. From out of this dark dynamic--where the rich can live forever while the working class dies--emerges hope in the person of Will Salas. Given more than a century by a rich man, Will sets out to destroy the system with help from a greedy tycoon's daughter, a quest that puts him in the crosshairs of a determined time cop. Amanda Seyfried and Justin Timberlake star in this dark tale. Cillian Murphy, Olivia Wilde and Alex Pettyfer co-star. Directed and written by Andrew Niccol. (PG13) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Time is the ultimate currency in a dystopian future in which humans stop aging at 25--but die in a year unless they get more time. From out of this dark dynamic--where the rich can live forever while the working class dies--emerges hope in the person of Will Salas. Given more than a century by a rich man, Will sets out to destroy the system with help from a greedy tycoon's daughter, a quest that puts him in the crosshairs of a determined time cop. Amanda Seyfried and Justin Timberlake star in this dark tale. Cillian Murphy, Olivia Wilde and Alex Pettyfer co-star. Directed and written by Andrew Niccol. (PG13) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: Trust the Man
programme.desc: Billy Crudup, David Duchovny, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Julianne Moore pair off to star as two New York couples seeking solutions to their domestic problems in this romantic comedy. Rebecca and Tom are married with kids--she's a busy flourishing actress, he's a stay-at-home dad in sexual overdrive. Meanwhile, Rebecca's lazybones brother Tobey has a live-in girlfriend Elaine, a novice author who seeks a deeper commitment...and possibly children. With a marriage counselor, an ex-girlfriend and a pretty playgroup mom thrown in the mix, could their coupling troubles get any more complex? Also with Eva Mendes and James Le Gros. Written and directed by Bart Freundlich. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Trust the Man
programme.desc: Billy Crudup, David Duchovny, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Julianne Moore pair off to star as two New York couples seeking solutions to their domestic problems in this romantic comedy. Rebecca and Tom are married with kids--she's a busy flourishing actress, he's a stay-at-home dad in sexual overdrive. Meanwhile, Rebecca's lazybones brother Tobey has a live-in girlfriend Elaine, a novice author who seeks a deeper commitment...and possibly children. With a marriage counselor, an ex-girlfriend and a pretty playgroup mom thrown in the mix, could their coupling troubles get any more complex? Also with Eva Mendes and James Le Gros. Written and directed by Bart Freundlich. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: The Beguiled (2017)
programme.desc: Sofia Coppola's "lurid, sweltering, and sensationally fun" (IndieWire) adaptation of this Southern Gothic tale of sexual rivalries, (previously filmed in 1971 with Clint Eastwood), stars Colin Farrell as a wounded Union soldier who triggers dangerous desires when he's taken in by the headmistress of an all-girls boarding school. Nicole Kidman, Kirsten Dunst and Elle Fanning co-star. Written for the screen and directed by Sofia Coppola, based on the novel by Thomas Cullinan.(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: From the makers of "Bridget Jones's Diary" and "Notting Hill" comes this "sexy love match" (US Weekly) about a rising American tennis star who falls for a British contender on the downside of his career, while competing in the prestigious Wimbledon tournament in London. Kirsten Dunst and Paul Bettany star in this charming romantic comedy. With Sam Neill and Jon Favreau. Directed by Richard Loncraine, written by Adam Brooks and Jennifer Flackett & Mark Levin. (PG13) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Real Sports with Bryant Gumbel 283
programme.desc: Segments: A surprising look at how psychedelic drugs can be used to treat depression, addiction and anxiety in athletes with head injuries; explorer Victor Vescovo has spent his fortune uncovering the deepest, most unknown parts of our planet; Meet some of sports' biggest super fans who are agonizing over being locked out of stadiums due to the pandemic.(n)

programme.title: Little
programme.desc: When a high-powered boss-from-hell wakes up one morning back in her 13-year-old body, she learns some valuable life lessons as she's forced to relive the painful moments of her adolescence that turned her into a bullying adult. Regina Hall, Issa Rae (HBO's "Insecure") and Marsai Martin star in this clever comic fantasy. Directed by Tina Gordon; screenplay by Tracy Oliver and Tina Gordon, story by Tracy Oliver.(n)

programme.title: John Q
programme.desc: Denzel Washington delivers a searing performance as a desperate father who takes drastic measures when his son needs a heart transplant and health insurance won't cover the cost of the operation. Robert Duvall, James Woods, Anne Heche, Eddie Griffin, Shawn Hatosy, Kimberly Elise and Ray Liotta co-star. Directed by Nick Cassavetes; written by James Kearns.(n)

programme.title: Underwater
programme.desc: Seven miles below the surface of the ocean something has awakened. Stranded on the ocean's floor after an earthquake, the crew of a drilling station attempt to escape only to encounter a monstrous presence with a bad attitude. Kristen Stewart, Vincent Cassel, Jessica Henwick, John Gallagher Jr., Mamoudou Athie and T.J. Miller star in this terrifying deep-sea monster movie. Directed by William Eubank; screenplay by Brian Duffield and Adam Cozad, story by Brian Duffield.(n)

programme.title: Alabama Snake
programme.desc: It's a chilling Southern Gothic tale of an attempted murder by rattlesnake. This documentary explores the mystifying events leading up to October 4, 1991, when an unusual violent crime was reported in Scottsboro, Alabama: Darlene Summerford accused her husband, Pentecostal preacher Glenn Summerford, of forcing her hand into a rattlesnake bed in an attempt to kill her. Employing dramatic re-creations and interviews with those who knew Summerford best, the documentary weaves between the past and present to unravel the details of the controversial investigation and trial that unfolded.(n)

programme.title: The Photograph
programme.desc: A picture from her late mother's past sends a renowned photographer on a search for answersand into an unexpected love affair with a handsome journalist. Issa Rae and LaKeith Stanfield star in this "rare treasure of a romantic drama" (Culture Mix). Co-starring Lil Rel Howery, Rob Morgan and Courtney B. Vance. Written and directed by Stella Meghie.(n)

programme.title: La La Land
programme.desc: Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone star in this charming and effervescent homage to classic movie musicals about a jazz pianist who falls in love with an aspiring actress as they both pursue their dreams of stardom in Hollywood. Winner of six Oscars(R), including Best Actress and Best Director. Co-starring John Legend and Rosemarie Dewitt. Written and directed by Damien Chazelle. (PG13) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: The Beguiled (2017)
programme.desc: Sofia Coppola's "lurid, sweltering, and sensationally fun" (IndieWire) adaptation of this Southern Gothic tale of sexual rivalries, (previously filmed in 1971 with Clint Eastwood), stars Colin Farrell as a wounded Union soldier who triggers dangerous desires when he's taken in by the headmistress of an all-girls boarding school. Nicole Kidman, Kirsten Dunst and Elle Fanning co-star. Written for the screen and directed by Sofia Coppola, based on the novel by Thomas Cullinan.(n)

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: Thirty years after the death of his father, a police officer is stunned to find himself communicating with him thanks to an old ham radio. What begins as an inexplicable supernatural phenomenon soon becomes an incredible opportunity to change the past forever. Dennis Quaid and Jim Caviezel star. Also with Andre Braugher, Elizabeth Mitchell and Noah Emmerich. Directed by Gregory Hoblit; written by Toby Emmerich. (PG13) (AC,AL,N,V).(n)

programme.title: Doctor Sleep
programme.desc: In this sequel to Stephen King's "The Shining," the troubled, now-adult Dan Torrance (Ewan McGregor) meets a teen who shares his extrasensory gift of the "shine" and tries to protect her from a cult whose members feed off the shine of innocents to become immortal.(n)

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: If you enjoyed the terror that Jordan Peele cooked up in 2017's ''Get Out,'' then you'd better fasten your seatbelt for this ''unforgettable dance with the devil'' (Richard Roeper, Chicago Sun-Times). Oscar(R) winner Lupita Nyong'o (''12 Years a Slave'') stars as a young woman who returns with her family to a beach town where she suffered a terrifying experience as a child. The past soon comes back to haunt the family with the arrival of four home invaders who have a horrifying secret. Winston Duke, Elisabeth Moss and Tim Heidecker co-star. Written and directed by Jordan Peele.(n)

programme.title: The Stepfather
programme.desc: Jerry Blake is a quiet suburbanite, devoted husband, doting stepfather, good neighbor and model citizen who's obsessed with having the perfect family, and will stop at nothing to achieve it...including murder. Terry O'Quinn, Jill Schoelen and Shelley Hack star in this chilling blend of horror and dark humor. Directed by Joseph Ruben; screenplay by Donald E. Westlake, story by Carolyn Lefcourt & Brian Garfield and Donald E. Westlake.(n)

programme.title: The Sentinel
programme.desc: A traitor is plotting to assassinate the President of the United States...and he's closer than anyone could imagine. Longtime Secret Service agent Pete Garrison (Michael Douglas) once took a bullet to save President Reagan. But some damning evidence--including the mysterious murder of a fellow agent--has Pete looking like the prime suspect in a scheme to kill the current President. With his former protege (Kiefer Sutherland) leading the manhunt to bring him in, Pete races to save the commander in chief and clear his name. Eva Longoria, Martin Donovan and Kim Basinger co-star. Directed by Clark Johnson; based on the novel by Gerald Petievich; screenplay by George Nolfi. (PG13) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: The life of music legend Johnny Cash and his volatile relationship with June Carter take center stage in this "absorbing and entertaining" (Variety) musical bio that earned Reese Witherspoon the 2005 Best Actress Academy Award(R). Directed by James Mangold, the film traces the life of the "Man in Black" (portrayed by Best Actor Oscar(R)-nominee Joaquin Phoenix) from his rough and tragic boyhood in Arkansas to his epic success that led him down a slow, steady path into alcoholism and addiction that would have destroyed him were it not for the love of his life, Carter. Ginnifer Goodwin and Robert Patrick co-star. Written by Gill Dennis & James Mangold; based on the books "Man in Black" and "Cash the Autobiography" by Johnny Cash.(n)

programme.title: Get On Up
programme.desc: He began life as a poor kid from rural South Carolina...but by the time he was done, he was only one thing: the "Godfather of Soul." Chadwick Boseman electrifies as the legendary James Brown in this exhilarating bio-pic that chronicles his rough upbringing, his rise to superstardom, and all of the larger-than-life mayhem and unforgettable music he produced along the way. Co-starring Nelsan Ellis, Dan Aykroyd, Viola Davis, Lennie James and Fred Melamed. Directed by Tate Taylor; screenplay by Jez Butterworth & John-Henry Butterworth, story by Steven Baigelman and Jez Butterworth & John-Henry Butterworth. (PG13) (AC,AL,N,V).(n)

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Blindness shaped his courage. Tragedy gave him soul. Channeled through his musical talent, he created magic. Jamie Foxx won the 2004 Best Actor Oscar(R) for his incredible portrayal of music pioneer Ray Charles in this "engrossing" (Variety) biographical drama. From the adversity of his childhood to his battle for success in the music business to the grip of drug addiction, director Taylor Hackford's film charts the highs and lows of a musician whose piano skills and one-of-a-kind voice blazed a lyrical trail through rock-'n'-roll, R & B, gospel and country. Kerry Washington, Clifton Powell, Harry Lennix, Terrence Dashon Howard, Larenz Tate, Richard Schiff and Regina King co-star. Directed by Taylor Hackford; screenplay by James L. White, story by Taylor Hackford and James L. White. (PG13) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: After a hotshot New York advertising exec suffers a personal tragedy, he falls into a deep depression and a downward spiral. But when he starts writing letters to 'Love,''Time' and 'Death,' he receives startling responses that help him deal with his grief. Will Smith, Edward Norton and Keira Knightley head an all-star ensemble cast in this poignant drama. Co-starring Michael Pena, Noamie Harris, Jacob Latimore, with Kate Winslet and Helen Mirren. Directed by David Frankel; written by Allan Loeb. (PG13) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: The Last Kiss
programme.desc: An immature man nearing the age of 30 faces an unexpected crisis when his girlfriend gets pregnant--and a girl still in college starts pursuing him! At the same time, his friends and his parents are experiencing problems of their own in this "unusually perceptive" (Hollywood Reporter) comedy-drama. Zach Braff plays the confused father-to-be. With Jacinda Barrett, Casey Affleck, Rachel Bilson, Michael Weston, Eric Christian Olsen, Marley Shelton, Harold Ramis, Blythe Danner and Tom Wilkinson. Directed by Tony Goldwyn; screenplay by Paul Haggis. (R) (AC,AL,BN).(n)

programme.title: Baby God
programme.desc: Once hailed as a miracle worker, Dr. Quincy Fortier's secret is now out. Formerly a renowned Nevada fertility specialist, he has become best known for deceiving countless women struggling to conceive by using his own sperm--without their knowledge or consent--to impregnate them. Featuring intimate and revealing interviews with many of Fortier's children, the film takes a close, nuanced look at the lasting effects that Fortier's misdeeds have had--and will continue to have--on the women he victimized, as well as their children and generations to come. The result is a stunning expose of the egregious, once undetectable truths about Fortier's medical practice, as well as his alleged sexual abuse of family members.(n)

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Brad Pitt stars in this visually stunning sci-fi epic, playing an astronaut traveling across the solar system in search of his long-missing father, whose doomed expedition now threatens humanity. Tommy Lee Jones, Ruth Negga, Liv Tyler and Donald Sutherland co-star. Directed by James Gray; screenplay by James Gray & Ethan Gross.(n)

programme.title: Queen & Slim
programme.desc: A black couple's first date turns into a nightmare after a minor traffic stop spirals out of control and the man kills a cop in self-defense, forcing the pair to go on the run. This gripping and powerful drama stars Daniel Kaluuya, Jodie Turner-Smith, Bokeem Woodbine, Chloe Sevigny, Flea and Indya Moore. Directed by Melina Matsoukas, screenplay by Lena Waithe, story by James Frey and Lena Waithe.(n)

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: Are we about to meet our makers? From legendary filmmaker Ridley Scott ("Alien") comes this "magnificent" (Roger Ebert) sci-fi opus that poses the ultimate answer to one of mankind's greatest mysteries: how did we get here? The discovery of vital cave paintings point to an answer trillions of years in the making--and result in a space mission to a remote world where human life may have originated. What the crew discovers is far more profound--and dangerous--than they could have ever imagined. Noomi Rapace, Michael Fassbender, Guy Pearce, Idris Elba, Logan Marshall-Green and Charlize Theron star in this "visually stunning" (Hollywood Reporter) film with a fascinating connection to "Alien." Nominated for the 2012 Best Visual Effects Oscar(R). Directed by Ridley Scott; written by Jon Spaihts and Damon Lindelof. (R) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: Galveston
programme.desc: From "True Detective" creator Nic Pizzolatto comes this pulse-pounding thriller about a mob hit man who narrowly escapes a set up by his boss while saving a young captive in the process. Ben Foster delivers a riveting performance as the grizzled killer bent on revenge; Elle Fanning co-stars as the young woman he vows to protect. Also with Robert Aramayo, Lili Reinhart and Beau Bridges. "A compelling experience for those who are willing to sample the darker side of cinema" (ReelViews). Directed by Melanie Laurent; written by Jim Hammett, based on the novel by Nic Pizzolatto.(n)

programme.title: Ruby Sparks
programme.desc: To author Calvin Weir-Fields, Ruby Sparks is the perfect woman: sweet, smart, fun, sexy, and with only one drawback: she's a figment of his imagination. As the focus of the Salinger-esque Calvin's long-awaited new novel, Ruby gets his creative juices flowing...until she steps off the page and into his life for real. Controlling her via his writing, Calvin soon learns that even though he holds the puppet strings, it doesn't help them avoid the inevitable pitfalls of any relationship. Paul Dano and Zoe Kazan star in this "gently touching metaphorical drama about the real essence of love" (Entertainment Weekly). Antonio Banderas, Annette Bening, Steve Coogan and Elliott Gould co-star. Directed by Jonathan Dayton & Valerie Faris; written by Zoe Kazan. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Queen & Slim
programme.desc: A black couple's first date turns into a nightmare after a minor traffic stop spirals out of control and the man kills a cop in self-defense, forcing the pair to go on the run. This gripping and powerful drama stars Daniel Kaluuya, Jodie Turner-Smith, Bokeem Woodbine, Chloe Sevigny, Flea and Indya Moore. Directed by Melina Matsoukas, screenplay by Lena Waithe, story by James Frey and Lena Waithe.(n)

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: Are we about to meet our makers? From legendary filmmaker Ridley Scott ("Alien") comes this "magnificent" (Roger Ebert) sci-fi opus that poses the ultimate answer to one of mankind's greatest mysteries: how did we get here? The discovery of vital cave paintings point to an answer trillions of years in the making--and result in a space mission to a remote world where human life may have originated. What the crew discovers is far more profound--and dangerous--than they could have ever imagined. Noomi Rapace, Michael Fassbender, Guy Pearce, Idris Elba, Logan Marshall-Green and Charlize Theron star in this "visually stunning" (Hollywood Reporter) film with a fascinating connection to "Alien." Nominated for the 2012 Best Visual Effects Oscar(R). Directed by Ridley Scott; written by Jon Spaihts and Damon Lindelof. (R) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: Galveston
programme.desc: From "True Detective" creator Nic Pizzolatto comes this pulse-pounding thriller about a mob hit man who narrowly escapes a set up by his boss while saving a young captive in the process. Ben Foster delivers a riveting performance as the grizzled killer bent on revenge; Elle Fanning co-stars as the young woman he vows to protect. Also with Robert Aramayo, Lili Reinhart and Beau Bridges. "A compelling experience for those who are willing to sample the darker side of cinema" (ReelViews). Directed by Melanie Laurent; written by Jim Hammett, based on the novel by Nic Pizzolatto.(n)

programme.title: Ruby Sparks
programme.desc: To author Calvin Weir-Fields, Ruby Sparks is the perfect woman: sweet, smart, fun, sexy, and with only one drawback: she's a figment of his imagination. As the focus of the Salinger-esque Calvin's long-awaited new novel, Ruby gets his creative juices flowing...until she steps off the page and into his life for real. Controlling her via his writing, Calvin soon learns that even though he holds the puppet strings, it doesn't help them avoid the inevitable pitfalls of any relationship. Paul Dano and Zoe Kazan star in this "gently touching metaphorical drama about the real essence of love" (Entertainment Weekly). Antonio Banderas, Annette Bening, Steve Coogan and Elliott Gould co-star. Directed by Jonathan Dayton & Valerie Faris; written by Zoe Kazan. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Glitter
programme.desc: Mariah Carey hits all the high notes in this heartwarming rags-to-riches tale that follows the life of a beautiful young singer. Billie Frank (Carey) is a struggling back-up vocalist until she meets a handsome, successful DJ named Dice (Max Beesley). Through his help and her lungs, Billie makes a meteoric rise to the top of the music charts. Along the way, she experiences the highs and lows of fame and fortune, love and loss...while always searching for the one piece of her childhood she desperately needs. With Da Brat, Tia Texada, Valarie Pettiford and Terrence Howard. Directed by Vondie Curtis Hall; written by Kate Lanier (Whats Love Got to Do With It). (PG13) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Cats
programme.desc: An all-star cast and state-of-the-art CGI effects bring to life Andrew Lloyd Webber's beloved smash musical based on the poems of T.S. Eliot. Starring James Corden, Judi Dench, Jason Derulo, Idris Elba, Jennifer Hudson, Ian McKellen, Taylor Swift, Rebel Wilson, Francesca Hayward. Directed by Tom Hooper; screenplay by Lee Hall & Tom Hooper.(n)

programme.title: Dolittle
programme.desc: Robert Downey Jr. stars as the eccentric veterinarian who can talk to animals in this delightful film for the whole family. After Queen Victoria falls ill, the doctor sets off on a quest to find a cure, accompanied by a young apprentice and a menagerie of exotic animals. Co-starring Antonio Banderas, Michael Sheen, Harry Collett, Emma Thompson, Rami Malek, John Cena, Kumail Nanjiani, Octavia Spencer, Tom Holland, Ralph Fiennes, Selena Gomez, Marion Cotillard. Directed by Stephen Gaghan; screenplay by Stephen Gaghan and Dan Gregor & Doug Mand, screen story by Thomas Shepherd.(n)

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: Veteran CIA spymaster Nathan Muir is on the verge of retirement when he learns that his young protege Tom Bishop has been captured and sentenced to death after an unauthorized rescue mission in China goes bad. With just 24 hours to save Bishop, whom the Agency plans to sacrifice for the sake of political expediency, Muir has to use all of his tricks to outwit his own superiors as well as enemy agents. Robert Redford and Brad Pitt star in this "fast, electric thriller" (Chicago Tribune). Co-starring Catherine McCormack, Stephen Dillane, Larry Bryggman. Directed by Tony Scott; screenplay by Michael Frost Beckner and David Arata, story by Michael Frost Beckner (R) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: The Fountain
programme.desc: Characters from three vastly different points in time search for a mystical fountain of youth in this mind-blowing excursion from the director of Requiem For a Dream. Hugh Jackman and Rachel Weisz each portray three different characters from three different times--a 16th-century search for the biblical "Tree of Life," a distant future in which a lone man travels through space in search of life's origins, and a present-day tale that connects past and future through the story of a man's search for a cure to his wife's terminal illness. Ellen Burstyn co-stars in this compelling film. Written and directed by Darren Aronofsky; story by Darren Aronofsky and Ari Handel. (PG13) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: Hotshot Washington, D.C. lawyer Robert Dean learns the hard way that it's not paranoia if they're really after you. When he is given a video tying a National Security Agency official to a murder, Dean goes on the run and meets up with a mysterious surveillance expert who helps him turn the tables on corrupt NSA agents who are waging a ruthless campaign to destroy Dean's life and retrieve the video. Will Smith and Gene Hackman star in this "dynamite thriller" (Rolling Stone). Co-starring Jon Voight, Regina King, Loren Dean, Jake Busey, Barry Pepper and Gabriel Byrne. Directed by Tony Scott; written by David Marconi. (R) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: 40 Years a Prisoner
programme.desc: In 1978, the escalating conflict between Philadelphia leadership and the Black liberation group MOVE led to one of the most controversial police shootouts in American historyand a son's four-decade-long fight to free his parents. The 1978 confrontation, which claimed the life of Officer James Ramp and saw unarmed MOVE member Delbert Africa nearly beaten to death, made headlines and culminated in murder charges and prison sentences of 30 to 100 years for nine MOVE members. This timely documentary chronicles the tireless fight by Mike Africa Jr., despite countless setbacks, to ensure the release of his parents and other MOVE members while illuminating the injustice under Police Commissioner-turned-Mayor Frank Rizzo and the media's role in exacerbating the conflict.(n)

programme.title: The Beguiled (2017)
programme.desc: Sofia Coppola's "lurid, sweltering, and sensationally fun" (IndieWire) adaptation of this Southern Gothic tale of sexual rivalries, (previously filmed in 1971 with Clint Eastwood), stars Colin Farrell as a wounded Union soldier who triggers dangerous desires when he's taken in by the headmistress of an all-girls boarding school. Nicole Kidman, Kirsten Dunst and Elle Fanning co-star. Written for the screen and directed by Sofia Coppola, based on the novel by Thomas Cullinan.(n)

programme.title: Axios 33
programme.desc: Guests: Alex Azar, United States Secretary of Health and Human Services; Christopher Krebs, Former CISA Director.(n)

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: From the bestseller by Stephen King comes this classic 1990 horror film. James Caan stars as world-famous author Paul Sheldon who awakens after a horrifying car crash in the remote cabin of Annie Wilkes (Kathy Bates in a jaw-dropping Oscar(R)- and Golden Globe-winning performance). When Annie learns Paul is killing off her favorite character in his books, she quickly turns from his dedicated Number One fan into a sadistic Enemy Number One. Co-starring Frances Sternhagen, Richard Farnsworth and Lauren Bacall. Directed by Rob Reiner; screenplay by William Goldman, based on the novel by Stephen King.(n)

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: From the bestseller by Stephen King comes this classic 1990 horror film. James Caan stars as world-famous author Paul Sheldon who awakens after a horrifying car crash in the remote cabin of Annie Wilkes (Kathy Bates in a jaw-dropping Oscar(R)- and Golden Globe-winning performance). When Annie learns Paul is killing off her favorite character in his books, she quickly turns from his dedicated Number One fan into a sadistic Enemy Number One. Co-starring Frances Sternhagen, Richard Farnsworth and Lauren Bacall. Directed by Rob Reiner; screenplay by William Goldman, based on the novel by Stephen King.(n)

programme.title: The Way Back
programme.desc: Sometimes it's not about changing the past--it's about getting a second shot. Ben Affleck delivers a superbly personal performance in this jarring film about a former high-school basketball superstar who quit the game and drowned a promising future in alcohol. Years later, he finds himself given one last shot at redemption--as the basketball coach at his alma mater. "Feels authentic all the way around" (San Francisco Chronicle). Co-starring Janina Gavankar, Michaela Watkins and Al Madrigal. Directed by Gavin O'Connor; written by Brad Ingelsby.(n)

programme.title: The Way Back
programme.desc: Sometimes it's not about changing the past--it's about getting a second shot. Ben Affleck delivers a superbly personal performance in this jarring film about a former high-school basketball superstar who quit the game and drowned a promising future in alcohol. Years later, he finds himself given one last shot at redemption--as the basketball coach at his alma mater. "Feels authentic all the way around" (San Francisco Chronicle). Co-starring Janina Gavankar, Michaela Watkins and Al Madrigal. Directed by Gavin O'Connor; written by Brad Ingelsby.(n)

programme.title: Richard Jewell
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood delivers one of his finest films with this "suspenseful, beautifully composed" (San Francisco Chronicle) picture that tells the story of Richard Jewell, an innocent man who became the prime suspect in the 1996 Centennial Olympic Park bombing in Atlanta. Sam Rockwell, Kathy Bates, Jon Hamm, Olivia Wilde and Paul Walter Hauser co-star in this riveting drama that earned both Oscar(R) and Golden Globe(R) acting nominations for Bates. Directed by Clint Eastwood; written by Billy Ray, based upon the article 'American Nightmare: The Ballad of Richard Jewell' by Marie Brenner.(n)

programme.title: Richard Jewell
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood delivers one of his finest films with this "suspenseful, beautifully composed" (San Francisco Chronicle) picture that tells the story of Richard Jewell, an innocent man who became the prime suspect in the 1996 Centennial Olympic Park bombing in Atlanta. Sam Rockwell, Kathy Bates, Jon Hamm, Olivia Wilde and Paul Walter Hauser co-star in this riveting drama that earned both Oscar(R) and Golden Globe(R) acting nominations for Bates. Directed by Clint Eastwood; written by Billy Ray, based upon the article 'American Nightmare: The Ballad of Richard Jewell' by Marie Brenner.(n)

programme.title: The Namesake
programme.desc: An Indian immigrant family learns to revere tradition while accepting American ideas in this film based on the novel. While living in India, Ashoke survived a deadly crash and attributed his fortune to his favorite author Nicholai Gogol whom he was reading at the time. Years later in America, Ashoke and his wife remember the author by giving the lively nickname Gogol for their first-born son, which the boy initially adores. In his teen years, Gogol's distaste for the name and his heritage grows, but within time he may realize its cultural value. Kal Penn, Tabu, Irrfan Khan, Jacinda Barrett, and Zuleikha Robinson. Directed by Mira Nair; screenplay by Sooni Taraporevala, based on the novel by Jhumpa Lahiri. (PG13) (AC,AL,N).(n)

programme.title: The Namesake
programme.desc: An Indian immigrant family learns to revere tradition while accepting American ideas in this film based on the novel. While living in India, Ashoke survived a deadly crash and attributed his fortune to his favorite author Nicholai Gogol whom he was reading at the time. Years later in America, Ashoke and his wife remember the author by giving the lively nickname Gogol for their first-born son, which the boy initially adores. In his teen years, Gogol's distaste for the name and his heritage grows, but within time he may realize its cultural value. Kal Penn, Tabu, Irrfan Khan, Jacinda Barrett, and Zuleikha Robinson. Directed by Mira Nair; screenplay by Sooni Taraporevala, based on the novel by Jhumpa Lahiri. (PG13) (AC,AL,N).(n)

programme.title: New Year's Eve
programme.desc: It's the biggest party night of the year. For one disparate group of characters, New Year's Eve in New York City marks a time for romantic beginnings...heartfelt reunions...and crushing endings. From renowned filmmaker Garry Marshall ("Pretty Woman," "Valentine's Day") comes this stirring drama that follows the highs and lows of various intertwined people as they navigate New Year's in the Big Apple. From a young woman trying to make sure the world-famous ball drops to a dying cancer patient who wants to witness the event one final time, it's an exhilarating and moving night that is guaranteed to touch your heart. The all-star cast includes Halle Berry, Jessica Biel, Jon Bon Jovi, Abigail Breslin, Robert De Niro, Josh Duhamel, Zac Efron, Hector Elizondo, Katherine Heigl, Ashton Kutcher, Seth Meyers, Lea Michele, Sarah Jessica Parker, Michelle Pfeiffer, Til Schweiger, Hilary Swank and Sofia Vergara. Directed by Garry Marshall; written by Katherine Fugate. (PG13) (AL).(n)

programme.title: Bee Season
programme.desc: A gifted speller from a dysfunctional family is coached to compete in bees by her Kabbalah-influenced father in this drama based on the best-selling novel. Eliza is the school-age daughter of Saul (Richard Gere), a religious studies professor whose marriage has become strained amidst other family troubles. But Eliza is a natural speller, and Saul believes he can coach his little girl to a championship bee by infusing a little Kabbalah wisdom into her training. Can her talent win her the title while renewing the family's bond? Juliette Binoche, Flora Cross and Max Minghella co-star. Directed by Scott McGehee & David Siegel. Screenplay by Naomi Foner Gyllenhaal, based upon the novel by Myla Goldberg. (PG13) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Far and Away
programme.desc: A hot-headed young farmer and a fiery upper-crust lass leave Ireland behind and head for America in search of freedom, land and love in this pictorially stunning (Washington Post) tale. Tom Cruise and Nicole Kidman star as the pair whose begrudging partnership deepens into something more as they face prejudice, violence and poverty on the way to the great Oklahoma land rush. Directed by Ron Howard; screenplay by Bob Dolman, story by Bob Dolman & Ron Howard. (PG13) ().(n)

programme.title: Gods and Monsters
programme.desc: "Few films have made it seem so natural to be haunted" (The New Yorker). As a young filmmaker in the early days of film, James Whale directed several unforgettable classics, including "Frankenstein" and its sequel "Bride of Frankenstein." Now in the twilight of his life, the ailing director has his memory sparked by his relationship with a handsome young gardener. Nominated for three Oscars(R) and a winner for Best Adapted Screenplay, the film stars Ian McKellen, Brendan Fraser and Lynn Redgrave. Directed by Bill Condon; screenplay by Bill Condon, based on the novel by Christopher Bram.(n)

programme.title: True Grit (2010)
programme.desc: Jeff Bridges saddles up as hard-drinking, irascible, one-eyed U.S. Marshal Rooster Cogburn, who is enlisted by a stubborn 14-year-old to track down the man who murdered her father. Matt Damon, Josh Brolin, Barry Pepper, and Hailee Steinfeld co-star in the Coen Brothers' gritty remake of the classic John Wayne western. Written for the screen and directed by Joel Coen & Ethan Coen, based on the novel by Charles Portis.(n)

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: The year was 1839. Aboard the Spanish galleon Amistad, a crew of Spanish sailors were slaughtered in a revolt by their cargo--53 African slaves. Branded as murderers, the slaves were captured and faced with a new threat to what they had murdered for: their freedom. Taking on one of the darkest and least-remembered racial injustices in American history, director Steven Spielberg not only does the story justice, but creates an epic film that is "artistically solid, if not always dramatically exciting" (Variety). Starring Morgan Freeman, Nigel Hawthorne, Anthony Hopkins, Djimon Hounsou, Matthew McConaughey, David Paymer, Pete Postlethwaite and Stellan Skarsgard. Directed by Steven Spielberg; written by David Franzoni. (R) (AC,AL,N,V).(n)

programme.title: Savages
programme.desc: Best friends Ben and Chon share a successful pot-growing business in Californiaand also share the same girlfriend, O. But when the leader of a vicious Mexican drug cartel tries to move in on their operation and kidnaps O, it triggers a high-stakes battle of wills that turns into an all-out war. This "stylish, violent, hallucinatory thriller" (Boston Globe) stars Taylor Kitsch, Blake Lively, Aaron Johnson and John Travolta, Benicio Del Toro and Salma Hayek. Directed by Oliver Stone; screenplay by Shane Salerno & Don Winslow & Oliver Stone, based on the novel by Don Winslow.(n)

programme.title: Grudge Match
programme.desc: Think "Rocky" vs. "Raging Bull" and you'll get an idea of what to expect from this funny and surprisingly moving comedy starring Robert De Niro and Sylvester Stallone as bitter former boxing rivals who enter the ring as senior citizens to settle a 30-year-old score. With "Grudgement Day" fast approaching, the pair must train like never before...while deflecting old-age cracks every step of the way. Kevin Hart, Alan Arkin, Kim Basinger and Jon Bernthal co-star. Directed by Peter Segal; screenplay by Tim Kelleher and Rodney Rothman, story by Tim Kelleher. (PG13) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: New Year's Eve
programme.desc: It's the biggest party night of the year. For one disparate group of characters, New Year's Eve in New York City marks a time for romantic beginnings...heartfelt reunions...and crushing endings. From renowned filmmaker Garry Marshall ("Pretty Woman," "Valentine's Day") comes this stirring drama that follows the highs and lows of various intertwined people as they navigate New Year's in the Big Apple. From a young woman trying to make sure the world-famous ball drops to a dying cancer patient who wants to witness the event one final time, it's an exhilarating and moving night that is guaranteed to touch your heart. The all-star cast includes Halle Berry, Jessica Biel, Jon Bon Jovi, Abigail Breslin, Robert De Niro, Josh Duhamel, Zac Efron, Hector Elizondo, Katherine Heigl, Ashton Kutcher, Seth Meyers, Lea Michele, Sarah Jessica Parker, Michelle Pfeiffer, Til Schweiger, Hilary Swank and Sofia Vergara. Directed by Garry Marshall; written by Katherine Fugate. (PG13) (AL).(n)

programme.title: Industry 05: Learned Behaviour
programme.desc: As Pierpoint is shaken by a former employee's scathing expose, Eric goes offsite for the day, prompting an unauthorized Gus to cover trades from his desk, while Harper maneuvers her way into a meeting with one of Eric's coveted, disgruntled ex-clients. But when Gus and Harper both cross the line, they risk compromising their futures at the bank. Following Robert's successful first business trip, Clement treats him to a special outing, while Yasmin works her connections to land a major client meeting.(n)

programme.title: Industry 05: Learned Behaviour
programme.desc: As Pierpoint is shaken by a former employee's scathing expose, Eric goes offsite for the day, prompting an unauthorized Gus to cover trades from his desk, while Harper maneuvers her way into a meeting with one of Eric's coveted, disgruntled ex-clients. But when Gus and Harper both cross the line, they risk compromising their futures at the bank. Following Robert's successful first business trip, Clement treats him to a special outing, while Yasmin works her connections to land a major client meeting.(n)

programme.title: Murder on Middle Beach 04: Reasonable Doubts
programme.desc: Finale. With the ten-year anniversary of his mother's death approaching, Madison leaves no stone unturned in his quest for the truth  despite concerns that his documentary may be doing more harm than good. As Madison presses on, there are surprising roadblocks to his investigation.(n)

programme.title: Murder on Middle Beach 04: Reasonable Doubts
programme.desc: Finale. With the ten-year anniversary of his mother's death approaching, Madison leaves no stone unturned in his quest for the truth  despite concerns that his documentary may be doing more harm than good. As Madison presses on, there are surprising roadblocks to his investigation.(n)

programme.title: Downhill
programme.desc: An idyllic ski vacation in the Alps takes a dark turn for a couple after a near-death experience forces them to reconsider their relationship. Julia Louis-Dreyfus and Will Ferrell star in this biting remake of the acclaimed Swedish film Force Majeure that finds the couple rocked by their reaction to nearly being killed in an avalanche. "A character-driven comedy working its way through a painful and real conflict" (Film Threat). Directed by Nat Faxon & Jim Rash; screenplay by Jesse Armstrong and Nat Faxon & Jim Rash.(n)

programme.title: Downhill
programme.desc: An idyllic ski vacation in the Alps takes a dark turn for a couple after a near-death experience forces them to reconsider their relationship. Julia Louis-Dreyfus and Will Ferrell star in this biting remake of the acclaimed Swedish film Force Majeure that finds the couple rocked by their reaction to nearly being killed in an avalanche. "A character-driven comedy working its way through a painful and real conflict" (Film Threat). Directed by Nat Faxon & Jim Rash; screenplay by Jesse Armstrong and Nat Faxon & Jim Rash.(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Hard-charging businessman Nicolas Cage gets a magical Christmas Eve chance to experience life as a family man with his college sweetheart in this heartfelt holiday romance. Tea Leoni co-stars in this moving tale that recalls "It's a Wonderful Life." Also with Jeremy Piven, Saul Rubinek and Don Cheadle. Directed by Brett Ratner; written by David Diamond & David Weissman. (PG13) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Hard-charging businessman Nicolas Cage gets a magical Christmas Eve chance to experience life as a family man with his college sweetheart in this heartfelt holiday romance. Tea Leoni co-stars in this moving tale that recalls "It's a Wonderful Life." Also with Jeremy Piven, Saul Rubinek and Don Cheadle. Directed by Brett Ratner; written by David Diamond & David Weissman. (PG13) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Suicide Kings
programme.desc: A bunch of rich kids abduct a retired mafia boss to force him to help save the kidnapped sister of one of the boys, but the cunning crook turns his captors against each other by playing clever mind games. Christopher Walken is in top form as the wily mobster in this darkly comic, twist-filled neo-noir. Co-starring Denis Leary, Sean Patrick Flanery, Johnny Galecki, Jay Mohr, Jeremy Sisto and Henry Thomas. Directed by Peter O'Fallon, screenplay by Josh McKinney and Gina Goldman & Wayne Rice, based on the short story The Hostage by Don Stanford. (R) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: Sound of My Voice
programme.desc: Infiltrating a California cult leads a pair of aspiring documentary filmmakers into a bizarre and increasingly perilous mystery. Maggie is a lovely, ethereal young woman with a curious hitch: she claims she is from the year 2054; severe allergic reactions force her to stay in a basement where she lives on the blood of her followers. Going undercover with the intent of secretly filming and exposing the cult, Peter and his girlfriend Lorna soon find themselves lured dangerously deep inside the charismatic Maggie's world. Christopher Denham, Nicole Vicius and Brit Marling star in this "tantalizing" (San Francisco Examiner) tale. Directed by Zal Batmanglij; written by Zal Batmanglij & Brit Marling. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Becoming Jane
programme.desc: Anne Hathaway stars as a young Jane Austen in the story of the untold romance that inspired the novels of the celebrated author. James McAvoy portrays a charming, but penniless, rogue who wins Austen's heart, much to the chagrin of her family who want her to marry for money. Julie Walters, James Cromwell and Maggie Smith co-star. Directed by Julian Jarrold; written by Sarah Williams and Kevin Hood.(n)

programme.title: Emma.
programme.desc: A ravishing, hilarious new take on Jane Austen's classic comedy, this stellar film stars Anya Taylor-Joy as the mischievous titular character who meddles in the love lives of those around her. "An unalloyed delight" (Movie Nation). Co-starring Johnny Flynn, Josh O'Connor, Callum Turner, Mia Goth, Miranda Hart and Bill Nighy. Directed by Autumn de Wilde; screenplay by Eleanor Catton, based on the novel by Jane Austen.(n)

programme.title: Jojo Rabbit
programme.desc: A 10-year-old German boy is a fanatical Nazi youth with Adolf Hitler as an imaginary friend--until he meets Elsa, the young Jewish girl his mother has been hiding. Nominated for six Academy Awards(R), including Best Picture, this unique film won for Best Adapted Screenplay. "A work of sublime sweetness and beauty" (Karen Gordon, Original Cin). Starring Roman Griffin Davis, Thomasin McKenzie, Taika Waititi, Rebel Wilson, Stephen Merchant, Alfie Allen with Sam Rockwell and Scarlett Johansson. Directed by Taika Waititi; screenplay by Taika Waititi, based upon the book "Caging Skies" by Christine Leunens.(n)

programme.title: Fahrenheit 451
programme.desc: Ray Bradbury's classic novel is infused with a decidedly 21st century sensibility in this dazzling, high-tech thriller. In an American future where the media is an opiate, internet bots control routines, history is truncated or rewritten, and celebrity "firemen" engage in televised search-and-destroy missions to burn books and bring their owners to justice, one zealous fireman begins to question his long-held assumptions about his life's work. Michael B. Jordan stars as the fireman who has been groomed to replace his captain (Michael Shannon). After meeting a young informant (Sofia Boutella), the fireman makes a dangerous decision to assist a group of underground "Eels" in their plan to preserve the contents of thousands of classic books, arts and culture. Directed by Ramin Bahrani; written by Ramin Bahrani & Amir Naderi.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black
programme.desc: The fetishes get fantastically funny in this raucous, raunchy spoof of the notorious erotic drama Fifty Shades of Grey. Marlon Wayans stars as the handsome entrepreneur whose relationship with a clumsy reporter (Kali Hawk) takes a kinky (and often comical) turn. Directed by Michael Tiddes; written by Marlon Wayans and Rick Alvarez.(n)

programme.title: Project X
programme.desc: "It's raunchy, reckless and ready to party," raved Rolling Stone magazine of this comedy about a high-school bash that goes wildly out of control. Desperately nerdy Thomas and his two pals are the hosts for the festivities when Thomas' parents leave town, but when the invitation goes viral, all hell breaks loose. Get ready for one insane evening of sex, drugs and rock-n-roll...plus a ton of booze, a dude with a flame-thrower, and a lot more! Starring Thomas Mann, Oliver Cooper and Jonathan Daniel Brown. Directed by Nima Nourizadeh; screenplay by Matt Drake and Michael Bacall, story by Michael Bacall. (R) (AC,AL,MV,N).(n)

programme.title: The Mustang
programme.desc: An angry, violent prisoner's life begins to change after he participates in a rehabilitation program to train wild mustangs. This powerful drama inspired by true events stars Matthias Schoenaerts, Jason Mitchell, Gideon Adlon, with Connie Britton and Bruce Dern. Directed by Laure de Clermont-Tonnerre; screenplay by Laure de Clermont-Tonnerre, Mona Fastvold, Brock Norman Brock.(n)

programme.title: Murder on Middle Beach 04: Reasonable Doubts
programme.desc: Finale. With the ten-year anniversary of his mother's death approaching, Madison leaves no stone unturned in his quest for the truth  despite concerns that his documentary may be doing more harm than good. As Madison presses on, there are surprising roadblocks to his investigation.(n)

programme.title: The Book of Henry
programme.desc: When an 11-year-old genius discovers that the girl next door has a terrible secret, he asks his single mom to help carry out an ingenious plan he has devised to save her. Naomi Watts, Jaeden Lieberher, Jacob Tremblay, Sarah Silverman, Lee Pace and Dean Norris star in this emotional drama. Directed by Colin Trevorrow; written by Gregg Hurwitz.(n)

programme.title: The Book of Henry
programme.desc: When an 11-year-old genius discovers that the girl next door has a terrible secret, he asks his single mom to help carry out an ingenious plan he has devised to save her. Naomi Watts, Jaeden Lieberher, Jacob Tremblay, Sarah Silverman, Lee Pace and Dean Norris star in this emotional drama. Directed by Colin Trevorrow; written by Gregg Hurwitz.(n)

programme.title: Suicide Kings
programme.desc: A bunch of rich kids abduct a retired mafia boss to force him to help save the kidnapped sister of one of the boys, but the cunning crook turns his captors against each other by playing clever mind games. Christopher Walken is in top form as the wily mobster in this darkly comic, twist-filled neo-noir. Co-starring Denis Leary, Sean Patrick Flanery, Johnny Galecki, Jay Mohr, Jeremy Sisto and Henry Thomas. Directed by Peter O'Fallon, screenplay by Josh McKinney and Gina Goldman & Wayne Rice, based on the short story The Hostage by Don Stanford. (R) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Two young scammers take advantage of a government policy allowing contracts to private businesses to become international gun runners in this hilarious, fact-based adventure. Jonah Hill and Miles Teller are outrageously funny as the ill-suited duo who find themselves rolling in both dough and danger while trafficking guns to the U.S. military during the Iraq War. "Nimble, gripping and terrific...with plenty of laughs" (Variety). Ana de Armas and Bradley Cooper co-star. Directed by Todd Phillips ("The Hangover" films); screenplay by Stephen Chin and Todd Phillips & Jason Smilovic, based on the Rolling Stone article "Arms and the Dudes" by Guy Lawson. (R) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Two young scammers take advantage of a government policy allowing contracts to private businesses to become international gun runners in this hilarious, fact-based adventure. Jonah Hill and Miles Teller are outrageously funny as the ill-suited duo who find themselves rolling in both dough and danger while trafficking guns to the U.S. military during the Iraq War. "Nimble, gripping and terrific...with plenty of laughs" (Variety). Ana de Armas and Bradley Cooper co-star. Directed by Todd Phillips ("The Hangover" films); screenplay by Stephen Chin and Todd Phillips & Jason Smilovic, based on the Rolling Stone article "Arms and the Dudes" by Guy Lawson. (R) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: Never Rarely Sometimes Always
programme.desc: A pregnant 17-year-old from a small Pennsylvania town travels to New York City with her cousin, intending to have an abortion in this "quietly devastating gem" (Variety). Starring Sidney Flanigan, Talia Ryder, Theodore Pellerin, with Ryan Eggold and Sharon Van Etten. Written and directed by Eliza Hittman.(n)

programme.title: Never Rarely Sometimes Always
programme.desc: A pregnant 17-year-old from a small Pennsylvania town travels to New York City with her cousin, intending to have an abortion in this "quietly devastating gem" (Variety). Starring Sidney Flanigan, Talia Ryder, Theodore Pellerin, with Ryan Eggold and Sharon Van Etten. Written and directed by Eliza Hittman.(n)

programme.title: Martha Marcy May Marlene
programme.desc: Elizabeth Olsen delivers a powerful performance as a young woman coping with the effects of cult brainwashing in this chilling psychological thriller. After escaping from a dangerous cult, Martha (Olsen) goes to live with her estranged older sister in an attempt to reclaim her identity and return to a normal life. But as she is haunted by traumatic memories from her past, Martha finds it increasingly difficult to distinguish between fantasy and reality, and becomes consumed by paranoia. Christopher Abbott, Brady Corbet, Hugh Dancy, Maria Dizzia, Julia Garner, John Hawkes, Louisa Krause and Sarah Paulson co-star. Directed and written by Sean Durkin. (R) (AL,GV,RP,SC).(n)

programme.title: Martha Marcy May Marlene
programme.desc: Elizabeth Olsen delivers a powerful performance as a young woman coping with the effects of cult brainwashing in this chilling psychological thriller. After escaping from a dangerous cult, Martha (Olsen) goes to live with her estranged older sister in an attempt to reclaim her identity and return to a normal life. But as she is haunted by traumatic memories from her past, Martha finds it increasingly difficult to distinguish between fantasy and reality, and becomes consumed by paranoia. Christopher Abbott, Brady Corbet, Hugh Dancy, Maria Dizzia, Julia Garner, John Hawkes, Louisa Krause and Sarah Paulson co-star. Directed and written by Sean Durkin. (R) (AL,GV,RP,SC).(n)

programme.title: Turistas
programme.desc: There's only one way these turistas are going home: in a body bag! An exotic Brazilian getaway turns into Destination: Terror for a group of young people in this unnerving horror flick. In search of sun and sexy fun, the group of twenty-somethings take a bus tour that leaves them stranded deep inland. Drugged, robbed and lured even deeper into the mysterious jungle, the group soon discovers the horrifying fate that awaits them. Josh Duhamel, Melissa George, Olivia Wilde, Desmond Askew, Beau Garrett, Max Brown, Agles Steib and Miguel Lunardi head up the cast. Directed by John Stockwell, written by Michael Arlen Ross. (R) (AC,AL,GV,N).(n)

programme.title: Biloxi Blues
programme.desc: "First-rate comedy with superb performances" says The New York Times about Neil Simon's autobiographical comedy-drama, based on his Broadway hit. Fresh out of high school and on his way to WWII boot camp, idealistic Eugene Jerome clings to three personal dreams: to win a Pulitzer Prize, lose his virginity and fall in love with the perfect girl. How he goes about this makes for an endearing story with Matthew Broderick (The Producers) as the Brooklyn youth. Directed by Mike Nichols (Working Girl).(n)

programme.title: Patch Adams
programme.desc: Robin Williams gives a tour-de-force performance in this heartwarming and hilarious comedy-drama based on a true story. Williams plays Hunter Patch Adams, a maverick medical student who clashes with the sober and impersonal medical establishment protocol in favor of constant jokes and clowning--sometimes literally wearing a clown costume--in order to develop a personal connection with his patients. Co-starring Monica Potter, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Bob Gunton, Daniel London, Peter Coyote. Directed by Tom Shadyac; screenplay by Steve Oedekerk, based on the book Gesundheit: Good Health is a Laughing Matter by Hunter Doherty Adams and Maureen Mylander. (PG13) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: This time, it may not be so elementary as Holmes and Watson match wits against devious arch-nemesis Professor Moriarty in this action-packed sequel. Robert Downey Jr. and Jude Law return as the ingenious detectives on the biggest case of their lives. When a series of bombings bring Europe to the brink of war, the world's greatest detective smells the hand of Moriarty at work. Can Holmes and his soon-to-be-married partner stop the criminal mastermind before it's too late? Noomi Rapace, Jared Harris and Eddie Marsan co-star. Directed by Guy Ritchie; written by Michele Mulroney & Kieran Mulroney. (PG13) ().(n)

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Brad Pitt stars in this visually stunning sci-fi epic, playing an astronaut traveling across the solar system in search of his long-missing father, whose doomed expedition now threatens humanity. Tommy Lee Jones, Ruth Negga, Liv Tyler and Donald Sutherland co-star. Directed by James Gray; screenplay by James Gray & Ethan Gross.(n)

programme.title: It
programme.desc: Every 27 years, an ancient evil awakens in the town of Derry, Maine and it has an insatiable appetite for children. From the terrifying bestseller by Stephen King comes this 2017 blockbuster that follows a group of bullied kids who are forced to face the murderous, shape-shifting creature that appears in the form of a malevolent clown named Pennywise. "Instantly takes its place among the most impressively twisted horror movies of our time" (Chicago Sun-Times). Starring Jaeden Lieberher, Wyatt Oleff, Jeremy Ray Taylor, Sophia Lillis, Finn Wolfhard, Jack Dylan Grazer, Chosen Jacobs, Nicholas Hamilton, Owen Teague, Jackson Robert Scott, Stephen Bogaert and Bill Skarsgard. Directed by Andy Muschietti; screenplay by Chase Palmer & Cary Fukunaga and Gary Dauberman, based on the novel by Stephen King.(n)

programme.title: Baby God
programme.desc: Once hailed as a miracle worker, Dr. Quincy Fortier's secret is now out. Formerly a renowned Nevada fertility specialist, he has become best known for deceiving countless women struggling to conceive by using his own sperm--without their knowledge or consent--to impregnate them. Featuring intimate and revealing interviews with many of Fortier's children, the film takes a close, nuanced look at the lasting effects that Fortier's misdeeds have had--and will continue to have--on the women he victimized, as well as their children and generations to come. The result is a stunning expose of the egregious, once undetectable truths about Fortier's medical practice, as well as his alleged sexual abuse of family members.(n)

programme.title: His Dark Materials 12: Tower of the Angels
programme.desc: Will and Lyra make a plan, unaware of the dangers or the cost involved.(n)

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: If you enjoyed the terror that Jordan Peele cooked up in 2017's ''Get Out,'' then you'd better fasten your seatbelt for this ''unforgettable dance with the devil'' (Richard Roeper, Chicago Sun-Times). Oscar(R) winner Lupita Nyong'o (''12 Years a Slave'') stars as a young woman who returns with her family to a beach town where she suffered a terrifying experience as a child. The past soon comes back to haunt the family with the arrival of four home invaders who have a horrifying secret. Winston Duke, Elisabeth Moss and Tim Heidecker co-star. Written and directed by Jordan Peele.(n)

programme.title: Turistas
programme.desc: There's only one way these turistas are going home: in a body bag! An exotic Brazilian getaway turns into Destination: Terror for a group of young people in this unnerving horror flick. In search of sun and sexy fun, the group of twenty-somethings take a bus tour that leaves them stranded deep inland. Drugged, robbed and lured even deeper into the mysterious jungle, the group soon discovers the horrifying fate that awaits them. Josh Duhamel, Melissa George, Olivia Wilde, Desmond Askew, Beau Garrett, Max Brown, Agles Steib and Miguel Lunardi head up the cast. Directed by John Stockwell, written by Michael Arlen Ross. (R) (AC,AL,GV,N).(n)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: He's an ace Navy SEAL who has completed missions all over the world. But now, Shane Wolfe is faced with his toughest assignment: children! Vin Diesel stars in this action-comedy as the tough-as-nails Wolfe who finds himself in unfamiliar territorydealing with everything from troubled teens to dirty diaperswhile keeping the five Plummer kids safe from their late dad's enemies. Co-starring Lauren Graham, Faith Ford, Brittany Snow, Max Thieriot, Morgan York, Carol Kane and Brad Garrett. Directed by Adam Shankman; written by Thomas Lennon & Robert Ben Garant.(n)

programme.title: The Eagle
programme.desc: "A rip-snorting adventure tale" (Roger Ebert). Twenty years after his father mysteriously disappeared with the Roman Ninth Legion in rural Caledonia, a Roman soldier ventures into the treacherous territory. His goal: to recover Rome's golden eagle emblem and redeem his family's name. Set in 140 A.D., the tale follows determined centurion Marcus Aquila and his slave Esca--a native of Britain whom he's not certain he can trust--as they journey into the remote lands occupied by savage warrior tribes that live to slay Romans. Channing Tatum, Jamie Bell, Donald Sutherland and Mark Strong star in this first-rate historical epic. Directed by Kevin Macdonald; screenplay by Jeremy Brock. Based on the novel 'The Eagle of the Ninth' by Rosemary Sutcliff. (PG13) (V).(n)

programme.title: Ford v Ferrari
programme.desc: It was a rivalry that could only be settled on the racetrack. In one corner was the mighty master of speed, Ferrari; in the other was an American upstart, Ford. Matt Damon stars as master car builder Carroll Shelby who is tasked by Ford to craft a car that can defeat Ferrari in one of world's most grueling races: the 24 Hours of Le Mans. Christian Bale co-stars as the volatile, but fearless driver Ken Miles who Shelby feels must be behind the wheel. Together, they must overcome personal demons, corporate meddling and ferocious competition to achieve their goal. "A full-bodied and exciting true-life story in which the men behind the wheels are just as dynamic as the machines they drive" (The Hollywood Reporter). Nominated for four Oscars(R), the film won for Best Sound Editing and Best Film Editing. Co-starring Jon Bernthal, Caitriona Balfe, Tracy Letts and Josh Lucas. Directed by James Mangold; written by Jez Butterworth & John-Henry Butterworth and Jason Keller.(n)

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Double your comedy fun with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Danny DeVito as the unlikeliest--and loopiest--twins ever to cut the cord. Separated at birth, the valorous hulk and his sleazeball, shrimpy twin reunite to search for their long-lost mom. But a stolen Cadillac and its multi-million-dollar cache might mean the end of their road! (PG) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: Herbie: Fully Loaded
programme.desc: The Love Bug is back! Herbie, the 1963 Volkswagen Beetle with a mind of his own, roars to life with spirited Lindsay Lohan behind the wheel and steering him into immortality on the NASCAR circuit. Justin Long, Breckin Meyer, Matt Dillon and Michael Keaton round out a stellar supporting cast in this speedy-fun family comedy that is sure to leave kids in stitches (the laughing kind!). Directed by Angela Robinson; screenplay by Thomas Lennon & Robert Ben Garant and Alfred Gough & Miles Millar, story by Thomas Lennon & Robert Ben Garant and Mark Perez, based on characters created by Gordon Buford. (G) (NA).(n)

programme.title: Kindergarten 06: One Fast Cookie
programme.desc: Lara just lost her first tooth. Aaron has been kissing all of the girls. Ben is in 'time out' again. And who's been eating all of the lettuce in the class garden? The fun and drama begins with the first day of Kindergarten, a 13-part documentary series that gets inside the hearts and minds of 23 real-life kindergarten students as they test the waters of academia for the first time. (TVY) (NA).(n)

programme.title: The Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child 13: The Princess and the Pea
programme.desc: Margaret Cho is the voice of the queen who can't find a princess good enough for her son in this Korean version of the classic tale. (TVY) (NA).(n)

programme.title: A Little Curious 35: Win Lose Tie
programme.desc: This innovative series teaches kids about the world around them with the help of quirky animated characters. (TVY) (NA).(n)

programme.title: Crashbox 14
programme.desc: This outrageously insane game show invites grade-school kids to play interactively through their TVs. The fun is served up on a mind-scrambling menu of educational brain teasers and puzzles, presented by a truly nutty band of state-of-the-art animated characters. Subjects like history, math, spelling and nature have never been so much fun to learn! (TVY7) (NA).(n)

programme.title: Pinky Dinky Doo 40: Lobster/Super Doo, Traffic Too
programme.desc: Pinky and Mr. Guinea Pig help Lobert the famous Lobster clean up his home after it is polluted. Great Big Fancy word: Polluted; A traffic jam keeps everyone from getting to Smack Dab Park for an animal party. The Super Duper Doos save the day! Great Big Fancy word: Considerate. (TVG) ().(n)

programme.title: The Electric Company 27: Friends or Aunts
programme.desc: Annie Scrambler and her aunt go head-to-head with Lisa and Hector on a semi-popular game show. (TVG) ().(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: The lively pink piglet trades farm life for an urban adventure in this sequel to the Oscar(R)-winning family film. Happy is the hog home of champion sheepherder Babe...until Farmer Hoggett gets hurt. Struggling to keep their farm afloat, Mrs. Hoggett takes up an offer to showcase Babe's shepherding skills at the State Fair. But an amusing airport mix-up soon has Mrs. Hoggett and her chatty pink piglet hoofing it around the big city...and making more outrageous animal friends. Starring Magda Szubanski, James Cromwell and Mickey Rooney. Directed by George Miller; screenplay by George Miller, Judy Morris and Mark Lamprell, based on characters created by Dick King-Smith. (G) (NA).(n)

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Tap-dancing penguin Mumble is now a daddy...and he's got an equally unique (and talented) son to help in this fun-filled family sequel. After a humiliating public experience, young Erik runs away from home. With Mumble on a desperate search to find his boy, calamity strikes leaving their entire penguin population trapped. Can Mumble and Erik find a way to save the day? "Happy Feet Two will bring a smile to your face" (IGN DVD). Featuring the voices of Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Hank Azaria, Alecia Moore (Pink), Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Sofia Vergara, Common, Hugo Weaving, Richard Carter, Magda Szubanski and Anthony LaPaglia. Directed by George Miller; written by George Miller, Gary Eck, Warren Coleman and Paul Livingston. (PG) ().(n)

programme.title: Elephant Kingdom
programme.desc: A mighty elephant leads the charge when an evil human king takes his wife and children captive in this enthralling animated tale. Featuring the voices of Cary Elwes, Patrick Warburton, Alexa PenaVega, Carlos PenaVega, Mikey Bolts, Ambyr Childers and Garrett Clayton. Directed by Melanie Simka; written by Doug Davidson.(n)

programme.title: Home Alone 4
programme.desc: Ingenious kid Kevin McCallister proves once again he is the master of the booby trap as he schemes to foil the ransom plans of an old nemesis and his cronies in this riotous fourth film in the "Home Alone" series. French Stewart, Mike Weinberg, Missi Pyle, Jason Beghe, Erick Avari, Barbara Babcock, Joanna Going and Clare Carey star. Directed by Rod Daniel; written by Debra Frank & Steve L. Hayes.(n)

programme.title: Alpha and Omega: The Big Fureeze
programme.desc: Kate and Humphrey are waylaid by a snowstorm while foraging for food. Now it's up to determined wolf pups Stinky, Claudette and Runt to save them while dealing with a pack of rogue wolves who are out to get them in this seventh "Alpha and Omega" film. Featuring the voices of Ben Diskin, Kate Higgins, Lindsay Torrance, Debi Derryberry, Blackie Rose and Shaun Gerardo. Directed by Tim Maltby; written by Tom Kane and Steve Moore, story by Steve Moore, based on characters created by Steve Moore and Ben Gluck.(n)

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: A coded distress message leads 17-year-old Josh on an adventure to Jules Verne's legendary 'Mysterious Island' in this thrilling sequel to 'Journey to the Center of the Earth.' Dwayne Johnson stars as Josh's step-dad whose attempt at father-son bonding sparks their journey to an island filled with incredible wonders...and unimaginable dangers. With only days to spare before the entire island is under water, the group must navigate giant lizards, bugs, birds, and even electric eels if they want to live to tell their amazing tale. Michael Caine, Josh Hutcherson, Vanessa Hudgens, Luis Guzman and Kristin Davis co-star. Directed by Brad Peyton; screenplay by Brian Gunn & Mark Gunn, story by Richard Outten and Brian Gunn & Mark Gunn. (PG) (MV).(n)

programme.title: Spies in Disguise
programme.desc: A suave secret agent must team up with a nerdy scientist after being inadvertently turned into a pigeon in this fun, fast-paced animated adventure. Featuring the voices of Will Smith, Tom Holland, Rashida Jones, Ben Mendelsohn, Reba McEntire, Rachel Brosnahan, Karen Gillan, DJ Khaled, Masi Oka. Directed by Nick Bruno, Troy Quane; screenplay by Brad Copeland and Lloyd Taylor, screen story by Cindy Davis, inspired by the animated short film ''Pigeon: Impossible'' by Lucas Martell.(n)

programme.title: Pokemon Detective Pikachu
programme.desc: When ace detective Harry Goodman goes missing, his son embarks on a journey with Detective Pikachu to find him. Chasing clues together through the neon-lit streets of Ryme City they encounter a diverse cast of Pokemon characters and uncover a shocking plot that could threaten the whole Pokemon universe. An "Enormously satisfying" (New York Post) film that is fun for the whole family. Starring Ryan Reynolds, Justice Smith, Kathryn Newton, Suki Waterhouse, Omar Chaparro, Chris Geere, Rita Ora, Karan Soni, Josette Simon with Ken Watanabe and Bill Nighy. Directed by Rob Letterman; screenplay by Dan Hernandez & Benji Samit and Rob Letterman and Derek Connolly, story by Dan Hernandez & Benji Samit and Nicole Perlman, based on the "Detective Pikachu" video game developed by Creatures Inc.(n)

programme.title: His Dark Materials 12: Tower of the Angels
programme.desc: Will and Lyra make a plan, unaware of the dangers or the cost involved.(n)

programme.title: Clockstoppers
programme.desc: Imagine if you had the ability to freeze time? For high-school teen Jesse Bradford, it's a dream come true when he straps on a watch invented by his scientist dad...until he runs afoul of a sinister businessman who will stop at nothing to have the device. Paula Garces, French Stewart, Michael Biehn and Robin Thomas co-star. Directed by Jonathan Frakes; screenplay by Rob Hedden and J. David Stem & David N. Weiss, story by Rob Hedden & Andy Hedden and J. David Stem & David N. Weiss. (PG) (MV).(n)

programme.title: Beasts of the Southern Wild
programme.desc: Life in a remote and dirt-poor southern Delta community known as the Bathtub is a harsh, unforgiving existence. But for feisty six-year-old Hushpuppy (Oscar(R)-nominated newcomer Quvenzhane Wallis), it is a place of beauty and life as only a child could recognize. Nominated for four Oscars(R), including Best Picture, Best Director and Best Adapted Screenplay, this "extraordinary" (Los Angeles Times) film follows Hushpuppy as she learns to survive from her rough-edged, but caring father (Dwight Henry) in the face of disaster and tragedy. Directed by Benh Zeitlin; based on the stage play "Juicy and Delicious" written by Lucy Alibar, screenplay by Lucy Alibar & Benh Zeitlin. (PG13) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Seven British seniors move to a retirement residence in India that doesn't come quite as advertised in this "charming Indian odyssey" (Hollywood Reporter). Calling the Best Exotic Marigold Hotel a dump is a kind understatement--birds are roosting in some rooms--but for the new arrivals, it soon reveals an enchanting side as they experience life in a wildly different culture. The superb ensemble cast includes Oscar(R)-winner Judi Dench ("Shakespeare in Love"), Bill Nighy, Dev Patel with Tom Wilkinson and two-time Oscar(R)-winner Maggie Smith ("The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie"). Directed by John Madden; screenplay by Ol Parker, based on the novel "These Foolish Things" by Deborah Moggach. (PG13) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Flipper (1996)
programme.desc: A disgruntled teen is befriended by a lovable dolphin in this splash-happy 1996 remake. Unhappy teen Sandy Ricks is feeling bruised by his parents' recent divorce when he is sent to the Florida Keys to visit his fisherman uncle. While reeling in his misery, Sandy joins Uncle Porter on a boat trip where a playful dolphin sends Sandy's spirits sailing...until a malicious mariner attempts to attack his new nautical friend. Starring Elijah Wood, Paul Hogan, Chelsea Field, Isaac Hayes and Jonathan Banks. Written and directed by Alan Shapiro. (PG) (MV).(n)

programme.title: Wings: Sky Force Heroes
programme.desc: The sky is the limit for the airplanes of Sky Force. But when brash young firefighter Ace blows off his orders, it leads to tragedy. Can Ace reclaim his confidence in time to save his former Sky Force buddies from disaster? Josh Duhamel, Hilary Duff, Rob Schneider, Jesse McCartney, Tom Skerritt, Dallas Lovato and Russell Peters head up the voice cast in this animated adventure.(n)

programme.desc: The puppet who wants to be a real boy belongs to an African-American prospector in this version featuring the voices of Will Smith, Chris Rock, Charles Dutton, Garrett Morris and Della Reese. (TVY) (NA).(n)
