Described as a "wild and crazy romp" by Variety, the film follows the quartet on a hilarious and totally uncensored night of debauchery, drug dealers, "sharting," and more. Max Records, Ari Graynor, JB Smoove and Sam Rockwell star. Directed by David Gordon Green; written by Brian Gatewood & Alessandro Tanaka. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Boys and Girls
programme.desc: For polar opposites Ryan (Freddie Prinze Jr.) and Jennifer (Claire Forlani), a relationship that began with their meeting as 12-year-olds on an airplane has developed into an unexpected friendship. But could it blossom into something more? Perhaps...if their opposing views don't get in the way. Jason Biggs, Amanda Detmer and Heather Donahue co-star in this engaging romantic comedy. Directed by Robert Iscove; written by the Drews.(n)

programme.title: American Beauty
programme.desc: "I'll be dead in a year," says Lester Burnham (played by Kevin Spacey), a middle-aged man who is about to rebel against everything that holds him down in his life--his age, his wife (Annette Bening), his job, even his body. Inspired by his lust for his teenage daughter's sexy friend, Lester quits his job, starts working out, buys the car he's always wanted, puts his cheating wife in her place...and finally starts to live again. Thora Birch, Allison Janney, Peter Gallagher, Mena Suvari, Wes Bentley and Chris Cooper co-star. Winner of five 1999 Academy Awards(R) including Best Picture, Actor (Spacey), Director (Sam Mendes), Original Screenplay (Alan Ball) and Cinematography. "A flat-out masterpiece" (New York Post). Directed by Sam Mendes; screenplay by Alan Ball. (R) (AC,AL,N,V).(n)

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: Two sexy outlaws go on a rampage in the name of justice in this female-buddy western. When a rich man and a peasant become the targets of a greedy landowner, their two respective daughters decide to get revenge! Privileged and poor become female bandits, robbing banks, intimidating some of the men in their path and winning over others--including a repressed criminologist. Penelope Cruz and Salma Hayek play the sizzling pair. With Steve Zahn, Dwight Yoakam and Denis Arndt. Directed by Joachim Roenning & Espen Sandberg. Written by Luc Besson and Robert Mark Kamen. (PG13) ().(n)

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Aging beauties Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn wage war for the affections of Bruce Willis in this hilarious dark comedy. Looks-obsessed Madeline made off with her pal's plastic surgeon fiancé years ago, though Helen plans to win him back--thanks to a potion for eternal youth. But Helen's supernatural scheme takes a comic turn when Madeline also sips the mystic tonic, rendering both women eternally youthful, beautiful and ready to battle! Also with Isabella Rossellini. Directed by Robert Zemeckis. Written by Martin Donovan and David Koepp. (PG13) (AC,AL,N,V).(n)

programme.title: Bigger Than the Sky
programme.desc: John Corbett ("Sex and the City") plays a veteran actor who takes a talented amateur under his wing for a local community theater's production of "Cyrano de Bergerac," only to find real life imitating the play's love triangle. Co-starring Amy Smart, Sean Astin, Clare Higgins, Patty Duke, Marcus Thomas and Allan Corduner. Directed by Al Corley; written by Rodney Vaccaro.(n)

programme.title: Something Borrowed
programme.desc: There's a fine line between love and friendship, but for a New York City attorney, that line becomes a precarious tightrope. Darcy (Kate Hudson) and Rachel (Ginnifer Goodwin) have been friends since childhood, but their bond is about to be put to the test after Rachel hooks up with Darcy's fiancee (and Rachel's old classmate) Dex just two months before their wedding. With guilt pulling her one way and her attraction to Dex in the other (and the wedding fast approaching), Rachel must decide between true love with Dex or her lifelong friendship with Darcy. John Krasinski, Colin Egglesfield, Steve Howey, Ashley Williams, Geoff Pierson and Jill Eikenberry co-star in this humorous and moving romantic comedy. Directed by Luke Greenfield; screenplay by Jennie Snyder Urman, based on the novel by Emily Griffin. (PG13) ().(n)

programme.title: The Big Year
programme.desc: Life goes to the birds--literally--for a trio of obsessed avian enthusiasts in this comedy starring Jack Black, Steve Martin and Owen Wilson. For devoted 'birders,' doing a Big Year is the ultimate quest: an informal competition to see or hear as many species as possible in a year. For Brad Harris (Black) and Stu Preissler (Martin), it's the culmination of a lifelong love of birding. But when reigning record-holder Kenny Bostick (Wilson) gets wind of their efforts, he takes the competition to fanatical new heights, leading the three on a comical circuit of America in search of warblers, woodpeckers, sapsuckers, and everything in between. Brian Dennehy, Anjelica Huston, Rashida Jones, Rosamund Pike, Dianne Wiest and Jobeth Williams co-star. Directed by David Frankel, screenplay by Howard Franklin. (PG) (MV).(n)

programme.title: Lil Rel Howery: Live in Crenshaw
programme.desc: Comedian, actor, writer and producer Lil Rel Howery performs before a live audience at a high school in Los Angeles in this stand-up special. Known for his well-crafted storytelling and hilarious impressions of the myriad characters he encounters in life, Howery draws on his personal experiences in his relatable, very funny performance as he tells the ins-and-outs of returning to his hometown of Chicago for his uncle's funeral and being told that it's "his turn" to pay for the funeral since he's so successful, and the experience of taking a bus to Mississippi with his grandmother. He also touches on such subjects as the frustrations of automated customer service reps, getting asked if he knows famous people, the things he's learned about women from having a daughter, turning 40, and more.(n)

programme.title: What's Your Number?
programme.desc: What's a girl do when her number puts her in danger of being unmarriageable? For Ally, a 20-something with 20-something men to her credit, it's time to settle down and revisit the past. Anna Faris stars as the dizzy blonde who resolves to stop fooling around and get serious--by tracking down all 20 of her exes to see if she missed out on Mr. Right. Chris Evans (Captain America, The Avengers) co-stars as her musician neighbor who helps Ally in her quest. Also with Ari Graynor and Blythe Danner. Directed by Mark Mylod; screenplay by Gabrielle Allan & Jennifer Crittenden. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: EdTV
programme.desc: Matthew McConaughey stars as an ordinary Joe whose world is turned upside-down when he agrees to let a TV network broadcast his life 24-hours a day--turning him into an instant celebrity. Ron Howard directed this "hilarious" (NY Post) comedy co-starring Jenna Elfman, Woody Harrelson, Ellen DeGeneres, Sally Kirkland, Martin Landau, Rob Reiner, Dennis Hopper, Elizabeth Hurley and Clint Howard. Directed by Ron Howard; screenplay by Lowell Ganz & Babaloo Mandel. (PG13) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: EdTV
programme.desc: Matthew McConaughey stars as an ordinary Joe whose world is turned upside-down when he agrees to let a TV network broadcast his life 24-hours a day--turning him into an instant celebrity. Ron Howard directed this "hilarious" (NY Post) comedy co-starring Jenna Elfman, Woody Harrelson, Ellen DeGeneres, Sally Kirkland, Martin Landau, Rob Reiner, Dennis Hopper, Elizabeth Hurley and Clint Howard. Directed by Ron Howard; screenplay by Lowell Ganz & Babaloo Mandel. (PG13) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Chasing Amy
programme.desc: A comic-book artist falls head over heels for a fellow artist, much to the dismay of his best buddy, only to learn that the object of his affection is only into women. Ben Affleck, Joey Lauren Adams, Jason Lee, Dwight Ewell and Jason Mewes star in writer-director Kevin Smith's insightfully raunchy look at sex, love and friendship.(n)

programme.title: Chasing Amy
programme.desc: A comic-book artist falls head over heels for a fellow artist, much to the dismay of his best buddy, only to learn that the object of his affection is only into women. Ben Affleck, Joey Lauren Adams, Jason Lee, Dwight Ewell and Jason Mewes star in writer-director Kevin Smith's insightfully raunchy look at sex, love and friendship.(n)

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Not since Caddyshack have laughs on the links been so prolific! Adam Sandler stars in this outrageous comedy as a former hockey player whose mighty slap shot and penchant for brawling, profanity and chaos make him an instant legend...on the pro golf tour. Christopher McDonald, Julie Bowen, Frances Bay and Carl Weathers co-star in this 1996 hit. Directed by Dennis Dugan; written by Tim Herlihy & Adam Sandler. (PG13) (AC,AL,BN,MV).(n)

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Not since Caddyshack have laughs on the links been so prolific! Adam Sandler stars in this outrageous comedy as a former hockey player whose mighty slap shot and penchant for brawling, profanity and chaos make him an instant legend...on the pro golf tour. Christopher McDonald, Julie Bowen, Frances Bay and Carl Weathers co-star in this 1996 hit. Directed by Dennis Dugan; written by Tim Herlihy & Adam Sandler. (PG13) (AC,AL,BN,MV).(n)

programme.title: I Think I Love My Wife
programme.desc: Chris Rock is a banker in a lackluster marriage who is tempted by a spicy woman in this comedy remake. With a good job, home and family, things are stellar in Richard Cooper's life...except the missing spark with his wife Brenda. Married for several years, their bedroom exploits have stalled leaving Richard lusting for other women. Enter the sizzling Nikki, an old acquaintance who shows up at his office for career advice...and possibly something more. Can Richard choose to stay faithful with this steamy siren in his workplace? With Kerry Washington, Gina Torres and Steve Buscemi. Directed by Chris Rock; screenplay by Chris Rock and Louis C.K.; based on the motion picture Chloe in the Afternoon. (R) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: I Think I Love My Wife
programme.desc: Chris Rock is a banker in a lackluster marriage who is tempted by a spicy woman in this comedy remake. With a good job, home and family, things are stellar in Richard Cooper's life...except the missing spark with his wife Brenda. Married for several years, their bedroom exploits have stalled leaving Richard lusting for other women. Enter the sizzling Nikki, an old acquaintance who shows up at his office for career advice...and possibly something more. Can Richard choose to stay faithful with this steamy siren in his workplace? With Kerry Washington, Gina Torres and Steve Buscemi. Directed by Chris Rock; screenplay by Chris Rock and Louis C.K.; based on the motion picture Chloe in the Afternoon. (R) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: She's an elf stuck on the shelf when it comes to love and luck--until she meets the man of her dreams in this endearing Christmas love story inspired by the music of George Michael. "Game of Thrones" star Emilia Clarke stars as the down-on-her-luck Christmas store employee; Henry Golding is the mystery man who inspires and attracts her. "A satisfying holiday flick worth giving your heart to" (Los Angeles Times). Michelle Yeoh and Emma Thompson co-star. Directed by Paul Feig; screenplay by Emma Thompson and Bryony Kimmings, story by Emma Thompson & Greg Wise.(n)

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: She's an elf stuck on the shelf when it comes to love and luck--until she meets the man of her dreams in this endearing Christmas love story inspired by the music of George Michael. "Game of Thrones" star Emilia Clarke stars as the down-on-her-luck Christmas store employee; Henry Golding is the mystery man who inspires and attracts her. "A satisfying holiday flick worth giving your heart to" (Los Angeles Times). Michelle Yeoh and Emma Thompson co-star. Directed by Paul Feig; screenplay by Emma Thompson and Bryony Kimmings, story by Emma Thompson & Greg Wise.(n)

programme.title: Chris Gethard: Career Suicide
programme.desc: Comedian/writer/talk-show and podcast host Chris Gethard brings his critically acclaimed one-man, off-Broadway show to HBO. Taped at the Tribeca Performing Arts Center in New York City, the show highlights Gethard's comedic and highly personal reflections on depression, alcoholism, suicide...and the other funniest parts of life. Produced for HBO by Funny or Die and executive produced by Judd Apatow, Gethard finds hope and humor in the strangest of places and holds nothing back over the course of this 90-minute special, as he dives into his experiences with mental illness and psychiatry. (TVMA) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: La La Land
programme.desc: Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone star in this charming and effervescent homage to classic movie musicals about a jazz pianist who falls in love with an aspiring actress as they both pursue their dreams of stardom in Hollywood. Winner of six Oscars(R), including Best Actress and Best Director. Co-starring John Legend and Rosemarie Dewitt. Written and directed by Damien Chazelle. (PG13) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Rock 'n' Roll High School
programme.desc: The Ramones lead the rebellion against conformity in this 1979 musical cult classic. P.J. Soles ("Halloween," "Carrie") stars as punk-crazed Ramones groupie Riff Randell, whose efforts to attend their upcoming show are thwarted by her school's villainous new principal. Naturally, Joey and the gang save the day with an electric onslaught of rapid-fire tunes including "Blitzkrieg Bop," "I Wanna Be Sedated," "Teenage Lobotomy" and the title track. Co-starring Vincent Van Patten, Clint Howard, Dey Young, Mary Woronov and The Ramones. Directed by Allan Arkush; screenplay by Richard Whitley & Russ Dvonch and Joseph McBride, story by Allan Arkush & Joe Dante.(n)

programme.title: Little Manhattan
programme.desc: The Upper West Side is the setting for first love between two fifth-graders in this endearing romantic comedy. Gabe Burton doesn't have much experience with love--his parents are divorcing, but still awkwardly living together, and he is only in fifth grade. But when old childhood pal Rosemary walks into his karate class, he's struck--not just with fists, but with deep affection for a girl. Starring Josh Hutcherson, Bradley Whitford and Cynthia Nixon. Directed by Mark Levin; written by Jennifer Flackett.(n)

programme.title: In Good Company
programme.desc: A corporate shakeup gets a veteran sales manager demoted and placed under the leadership of a young man who is half his age in this amusing comedy-drama. Dennis Quaid stars as Dan Foreman, a 51-year-old salesman whose old-school methods clash with those of his new boss--26-year-old Carter Duryea (Topher Grace). But while Dan struggles to adjust to the shock of his seismic employment shift, he's hit with two even more unexpected revelations: his wife is pregnant and his oldest daughter (Scarlett Johansson) has become romantically involved with his wet-behind-the-ears boss! Marg Helgenberger, David Paymer, Philip Baker Hall and Selma Blair co-star. Written and directed by Paul Weitz (American Pie). (PG13) (AL).(n)

programme.title: Muriel's Wedding
programme.desc: Toni Collette ("The Sixth Sense") is the "ugly duckling" of this "romping, bittersweet comedy" (The Hollywood Reporter) about an ugly, overweight and often inappropriate young woman who yearns to walk down the aisle...even though she's never had a date! It all leads to an adventure that is both funny and poignant. With Bill Hunter, Rachel Griffiths (HBO's Six Feet Under) and Daniel Lapaine. Written and directed by first-time helmer Paul J. Hogan.(n)

programme.title: Yvonne Orji: Momma, I Made It!
programme.desc: Comedian and actress Yvonne Orji (HBO's "Insecure") takes the stage in this special taped in front of a live audience at the Howard Theatre, just blocks away from Howard University Hospital, where Yvonne's mom practiced as a nurse for 27 years. Interspersed with vibrant, personal footage shot in Nigeria  Yvonne's native home  during a milestone trip in early January, the show takes an intimate, hilarious look at what being Nigerian-American means to Yvonne  from her international haggling addiction; to having her phone tapped by her parents as a kid; to the fine line between cursing people out and putting curses on them.(n)

programme.title: Six Days, Seven Nights
programme.desc: There's trouble in paradise when a grouchy cargo pilot on a tropical island agrees to fly a vacationing Manhattan magazine editor to Tahiti for the day and his old plane is forced down in a storm. Stranded on a deserted isle, the two must learn to work together--before they drive each other crazy! Harrison Ford and Anne Heche star in this "entertaining romantic comedy" (Leonard Maltin's Movie Guide). With David Schwimmer and Temuera Morrison. Directed by Ivan Reitman; written by Michael Browning. (PG13) (AC,AL,BN,V).(n)

programme.title: A Prairie Home Companion
programme.desc: "Four stars...a lovely film" (Roger Ebert). Legendary director Robert Altman's final film before his death is a stirring recreation of Garrison Keillor's beloved radio show. Featuring an all-star cast along with Keillor and many of his amusing regulars, the film follows the events leading up to the final broadcast of the radio programwhich has been axed by its corporate owners. "Not since Woody Allen's Radio Days has anyone created such a cinematic Valentine to the wonderfully imaginative medium of radio" (Hollywood Reporter). Woody Harrelson, Tommy Lee Jones, Garrison Keillor, Kevin Kline, Lindsay Lohan, Virginia Madsen, John C. Reilly, Maya Rudolph, Meryl Streep, Lily Tomlin, Marylouise Burke, L.Q. Jones, Tim Russell and Sue Scott star. Directed by Robert Altman (Gosford Park); screenplay by Garrison Keillor; story by Garrison Keillor & Ken LaZebnik.(n)

programme.title: Dan Soder: Son of a Gary
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Dan Soder ("Billions," "The Standups") brings his honest and hilarious humor in his first HBO comedy special. Taped at The Bowery Ballroom in New York City before a sold-out, live audience, this special showcases his down to earth approach to material that affects his life on every level. Topics include drug dogs at the airport, the customer service generation, fake fights in the shower, and what it's like to have an alcoholic dad, but a fun one.(n)

programme.title: Chris Gethard: Career Suicide
programme.desc: Comedian/writer/talk-show and podcast host Chris Gethard brings his critically acclaimed one-man, off-Broadway show to HBO. Taped at the Tribeca Performing Arts Center in New York City, the show highlights Gethard's comedic and highly personal reflections on depression, alcoholism, suicide...and the other funniest parts of life. Produced for HBO by Funny or Die and executive produced by Judd Apatow, Gethard finds hope and humor in the strangest of places and holds nothing back over the course of this 90-minute special, as he dives into his experiences with mental illness and psychiatry. (TVMA) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Lola Versus
programme.desc: After she is unceremoniously dumped by her fiance just weeks before the wedding, 29-year-old Lola seeks advice from her eccentric best friends and hippie parents as she embarks on a funny and emotional journey to find herself before she hits the big three-oh. Greta Gerwig ("Greenberg") shines in this quirky romantic comedy co-starring Joel Kinnaman, Zoe Lister-Jones, Hamish Linklater, Bill Pullman and Debra Winger. Directed by Daryl Wein; written by Zoe Lister-Jones & Daryl Wein. (R) ().(n)

programme.title: Lola Versus
programme.desc: After she is unceremoniously dumped by her fiance just weeks before the wedding, 29-year-old Lola seeks advice from her eccentric best friends and hippie parents as she embarks on a funny and emotional journey to find herself before she hits the big three-oh. Greta Gerwig ("Greenberg") shines in this quirky romantic comedy co-starring Joel Kinnaman, Zoe Lister-Jones, Hamish Linklater, Bill Pullman and Debra Winger. Directed by Daryl Wein; written by Zoe Lister-Jones & Daryl Wein. (R) ().(n)

programme.title: Little
programme.desc: When a high-powered boss-from-hell wakes up one morning back in her 13-year-old body, she learns some valuable life lessons as she's forced to relive the painful moments of her adolescence that turned her into a bullying adult. Regina Hall, Issa Rae (HBO's "Insecure") and Marsai Martin star in this clever comic fantasy. Directed by Tina Gordon; screenplay by Tracy Oliver and Tina Gordon, story by Tracy Oliver.(n)

programme.title: Little
programme.desc: When a high-powered boss-from-hell wakes up one morning back in her 13-year-old body, she learns some valuable life lessons as she's forced to relive the painful moments of her adolescence that turned her into a bullying adult. Regina Hall, Issa Rae (HBO's "Insecure") and Marsai Martin star in this clever comic fantasy. Directed by Tina Gordon; screenplay by Tracy Oliver and Tina Gordon, story by Tracy Oliver.(n)

programme.title: Swingers
programme.desc: Jon Favreau and Vince Vaughn star in this "winningly confident snapshot" (Variety) of a group of Hollywood hopefuls as they party and girl-hunt into the wee hours. Mike (Favreau) is an aspiring comedian who has turned into a pathetic lump in the wake of a bad breakup. His slick-talking buddy Trent (Vaughn) has just the solution to raise Mike's spirits: a series of wild outings, including a trip to Vegas. Ron Livingston, Patrick Van Horn, Alex Desert and Heather Graham co-star in this "captivating comedy" (Hollywood Reporter). Directed by Doug Liman, written by Jon Favreau. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Swingers
programme.desc: Jon Favreau and Vince Vaughn star in this "winningly confident snapshot" (Variety) of a group of Hollywood hopefuls as they party and girl-hunt into the wee hours. Mike (Favreau) is an aspiring comedian who has turned into a pathetic lump in the wake of a bad breakup. His slick-talking buddy Trent (Vaughn) has just the solution to raise Mike's spirits: a series of wild outings, including a trip to Vegas. Ron Livingston, Patrick Van Horn, Alex Desert and Heather Graham co-star in this "captivating comedy" (Hollywood Reporter). Directed by Doug Liman, written by Jon Favreau. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Made
programme.desc: Jon Favreau wrote, directed and co-stars with Vince Vaughn in this "hilarious" (New York Post) crime caper. Bobby (Favreau) is a would-be boxer and his lifelong pal Ricky (Vaughn) is a two-bit hustler who dreams of being a mafia bigshot. The hapless friends get in over their heads when Ricky's loose lips and cockiness lands them in trouble with rival gangsters while on a trip from L.A. to New York to run an errand for a mob boss. Co-starring Sean Combs, Famke Janssen, Faizon Love, Vincent Pastore and Peter Falk. Written and directed by Jon Favreau. (R) (AC,AL,N,V).(n)

programme.title: Made
programme.desc: Jon Favreau wrote, directed and co-stars with Vince Vaughn in this "hilarious" (New York Post) crime caper. Bobby (Favreau) is a would-be boxer and his lifelong pal Ricky (Vaughn) is a two-bit hustler who dreams of being a mafia bigshot. The hapless friends get in over their heads when Ricky's loose lips and cockiness lands them in trouble with rival gangsters while on a trip from L.A. to New York to run an errand for a mob boss. Co-starring Sean Combs, Famke Janssen, Faizon Love, Vincent Pastore and Peter Falk. Written and directed by Jon Favreau. (R) (AC,AL,N,V).(n)

programme.title: Clerks
programme.desc: In this comic highlight of the 1994 Sundance Film Festivalmade by first-time director Kevin Smith for only $27,000two New Jersey store clerks make it through their day...barely. Dante works in a convenience store, while his friend mans a video store. Both of them would rather be doing somethinganythingelse, and let their customers know it. "Buoyant, bleakly funny" (New York Times). With Brian O'Halloran, Jeff Anderson, Marilyn Ghigliotti, Lisa Spoonauer, Jason Mewes and Kevin Smith (as "Silent Bob"). Directed by Kevin Smith; written by Kevin Smith.(n)

programme.title: Clerks
programme.desc: In this comic highlight of the 1994 Sundance Film Festivalmade by first-time director Kevin Smith for only $27,000two New Jersey store clerks make it through their day...barely. Dante works in a convenience store, while his friend mans a video store. Both of them would rather be doing somethinganythingelse, and let their customers know it. "Buoyant, bleakly funny" (New York Times). With Brian O'Halloran, Jeff Anderson, Marilyn Ghigliotti, Lisa Spoonauer, Jason Mewes and Kevin Smith (as "Silent Bob"). Directed by Kevin Smith; written by Kevin Smith.(n)

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: Music-obsessed record-store manager John Cusack has a rankings list for everything in his life...including his Top 5 breakups. When his girlfriend leaves him for an arrogant New Age therapist, he tries to win her back--but first he must learn to show her the same passion he and his crazy co-workers have for vinyl. Jack Black, Lisa Bonet, Joelle Carter, Joan Cusack, Sara Gilbert, Iben Hjejle, Todd Louiso, Tim Robbins, Lili Taylor and Natasha Gregson Wagner co-star. Directed by Stephen Frears; screenplay by D.V. DeVincentis & Steve Pink & John Cusack and Scott Rosenberg, based upon the book by Nick Hornby. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Desperately Seeking Susan
programme.desc: A bored New Jersey housewife stumbles into the screwball adventure of her life! Stalking a pair of lovers whose flamboyant affair she has been following in a newspaper personals column, she discovers a funny, eccentric underworld. Rock queen Madonna stars as the elusive Susan who takes housewife Rosanna Arquette on an outrageous chase through New York's alleys and late-night clubs. Aidan Quinn plays a movie projectionist who has to come to Arquette's aid more than once. A playful roller-coaster ride of a movie, full of mistaken identities, missed connections and newfound romance. (PG13) (AC,AL,BN,V).(n)

programme.title: Much Ado About Nothing
programme.desc: Joss Whedon does Shakespeare? It may seem strange coming from the man behind "The Avengers" and "Buffy the Vampire Slayer," but the superb result is this "delightfully spirited romp" (USA Today). Set in modern-day California, but retaining the Bard's original dialogue, this black-and-white film (shot in just 12 days) follows two young couples in a rousing tale of love, deception, scandal and wit. Starring Amy Acker, Alexis Denisof, Nathan Fillion, Clark Gregg, Reed Diamond, Fran Kranz, Jillian Morgese, Sean Maher, Spencer Treat Clark, Riki Lindhome, Ashley Johnson, Emma Bates and Tom Lenk. Directed by Joss Whedon; written for the screen by Joss Whedon, based on the play by William Shakespeare.(n)

programme.title: Spies in Disguise
programme.desc: A suave secret agent must team up with a nerdy scientist after being inadvertently turned into a pigeon in this fun, fast-paced animated adventure. Featuring the voices of Will Smith, Tom Holland, Rashida Jones, Ben Mendelsohn, Reba McEntire, Rachel Brosnahan, Karen Gillan, DJ Khaled, Masi Oka. Directed by Nick Bruno, Troy Quane; screenplay by Brad Copeland and Lloyd Taylor, screen story by Cindy Davis, inspired by the animated short film ''Pigeon: Impossible'' by Lucas Martell.(n)

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: Two sexy outlaws go on a rampage in the name of justice in this female-buddy western. When a rich man and a peasant become the targets of a greedy landowner, their two respective daughters decide to get revenge! Privileged and poor become female bandits, robbing banks, intimidating some of the men in their path and winning over others--including a repressed criminologist. Penelope Cruz and Salma Hayek play the sizzling pair. With Steve Zahn, Dwight Yoakam and Denis Arndt. Directed by Joachim Roenning & Espen Sandberg. Written by Luc Besson and Robert Mark Kamen. (PG13) ().(n)

programme.title: Old Dogs
programme.desc: John Travolta and Robin Williams are hilarious as best friends and business partners who suddenly find themselves in the toughest job of their lives: parenting. Kelly Preston, Seth Green and Matt Dillon co-star in this hilarious 2009 comedy the whole family will love. Directed by Walt Becker; written by David Diamond & David Weissman.(n)

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Mother-daughter con artists Sigourney Weaver and Jennifer Love Hewitt have their biggest con yet threatened by love, death and double-dealing in this hit comedy. Ray Liotta, Jason Lee, Jeffrey Jones and a hilarious, chain-smoking Gene Hackman co-star in this laughfest that "hits just the right note between naughty and raunchy" (Salon.com). Directed by David Mirkin; written by Robert Dunn and Paul Guay & Stephen Mazur. (PG13) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: Chasing Amy
programme.desc: A comic-book artist falls head over heels for a fellow artist, much to the dismay of his best buddy, only to learn that the object of his affection is only into women. Ben Affleck, Joey Lauren Adams, Jason Lee, Dwight Ewell and Jason Mewes star in writer-director Kevin Smith's insightfully raunchy look at sex, love and friendship.(n)

programme.title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Seven British seniors move to a retirement residence in India that doesn't come quite as advertised in this "charming Indian odyssey" (Hollywood Reporter). Calling the Best Exotic Marigold Hotel a dump is a kind understatement--birds are roosting in some rooms--but for the new arrivals, it soon reveals an enchanting side as they experience life in a wildly different culture. The superb ensemble cast includes Oscar(R)-winner Judi Dench ("Shakespeare in Love"), Bill Nighy, Dev Patel with Tom Wilkinson and two-time Oscar(R)-winner Maggie Smith ("The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie"). Directed by John Madden; screenplay by Ol Parker, based on the novel "These Foolish Things" by Deborah Moggach. (PG13) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: Music-obsessed record-store manager John Cusack has a rankings list for everything in his life...including his Top 5 breakups. When his girlfriend leaves him for an arrogant New Age therapist, he tries to win her back--but first he must learn to show her the same passion he and his crazy co-workers have for vinyl. Jack Black, Lisa Bonet, Joelle Carter, Joan Cusack, Sara Gilbert, Iben Hjejle, Todd Louiso, Tim Robbins, Lili Taylor and Natasha Gregson Wagner co-star. Directed by Stephen Frears; screenplay by D.V. DeVincentis & Steve Pink & John Cusack and Scott Rosenberg, based upon the book by Nick Hornby. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Date Movie
programme.desc: The romantic comedy genre gets skewered Scary Movie-style in this riotous parody that spoofs everything from My Big Fat Greek Wedding to Napoleon Dynamite. Alyson Hannigan stars as overweight waitress Julia Jones, whose love for a handsome customer prompts her to seek help. Losing weight and gaining confidence, Julia finally scores her man--the dreamy Grant Funkyerdoder (Adam Campbell)--but can she keep him amidst the challenges of her "Greek" father and a foxy romantic rival? Co-starring Jennifer Coolidge, Tony Cox, Fred Willard and Eddie Griffin. Directed by Aaron Seltzer, written by Jason Friedberg & Aaron Seltzer. (PG13) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: Date Movie
programme.desc: The romantic comedy genre gets skewered Scary Movie-style in this riotous parody that spoofs everything from My Big Fat Greek Wedding to Napoleon Dynamite. Alyson Hannigan stars as overweight waitress Julia Jones, whose love for a handsome customer prompts her to seek help. Losing weight and gaining confidence, Julia finally scores her man--the dreamy Grant Funkyerdoder (Adam Campbell)--but can she keep him amidst the challenges of her "Greek" father and a foxy romantic rival? Co-starring Jennifer Coolidge, Tony Cox, Fred Willard and Eddie Griffin. Directed by Aaron Seltzer, written by Jason Friedberg & Aaron Seltzer. (PG13) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: London has been overrun by zombies. So what's a bumbling salesman to do? Lead his family and friends to the safety of his favorite pub, of course! Armed with only a cricket bat, a shovel and some old records, Shaun and his slobbish buddy Ed lead a moronic mission to get their loved ones to the Winchester Pub for safety...and a few pints. Simon Pegg, Kate Ashfield, Lucy Davis, Nick Frost, Dylan Moran, Bill Nighy and Penelope Wilton star in this cult classic. Directed by Edgar Wright; written by Simon Pegg and Edgar Wright. (R) (AL,GV).(n)

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: London has been overrun by zombies. So what's a bumbling salesman to do? Lead his family and friends to the safety of his favorite pub, of course! Armed with only a cricket bat, a shovel and some old records, Shaun and his slobbish buddy Ed lead a moronic mission to get their loved ones to the Winchester Pub for safety...and a few pints. Simon Pegg, Kate Ashfield, Lucy Davis, Nick Frost, Dylan Moran, Bill Nighy and Penelope Wilton star in this cult classic. Directed by Edgar Wright; written by Simon Pegg and Edgar Wright. (R) (AL,GV).(n)

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: How do you deal with the worst boss in the world? For three long-suffering professionals working under the nastiest, greediest and most sexually twisted leaders known to man, there's only one solution: kill them! Jason Bateman, Charlie Day and Jason Sudeikis star as the three whose ineptitude when it comes to killing knows no bounds in this outrageous comedy. Jennifer Aniston (nymphomaniac dentist), Colin Farrell (sleazy, drug sniffing CEO) and Kevin Spacey (sadist/executive) co-star as the unholy trio of overseers. Also with Donald Sutherland and Jamie Foxx. Directed by Seth Gordon; screenplay by Michael Markowitz and John Francis Daley & Jonathan Goldstein, story by Michael Markowitz.(n)

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: How do you deal with the worst boss in the world? For three long-suffering professionals working under the nastiest, greediest and most sexually twisted leaders known to man, there's only one solution: kill them! Jason Bateman, Charlie Day and Jason Sudeikis star as the three whose ineptitude when it comes to killing knows no bounds in this outrageous comedy. Jennifer Aniston (nymphomaniac dentist), Colin Farrell (sleazy, drug sniffing CEO) and Kevin Spacey (sadist/executive) co-star as the unholy trio of overseers. Also with Donald Sutherland and Jamie Foxx. Directed by Seth Gordon; screenplay by Michael Markowitz and John Francis Daley & Jonathan Goldstein, story by Michael Markowitz.(n)

programme.title: 8 Heads in a Duffel Bag
programme.desc: Watch out, you might just laugh your head off at this zany gangland comedy. When tough guy Tommy Spinelli (Joe Pesci) is ordered to deliver the heads of eight late mobsters as proof of a hit, he simply jams them into a duffel bag. But an airport baggage mixup turns Tommy's crazy cargo into the surprise package of the century--and a comedy that's so funny it's criminal. With George Hamilton, Dyan Cannon, David Spade. (R) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: 8 Heads in a Duffel Bag
programme.desc: Watch out, you might just laugh your head off at this zany gangland comedy. When tough guy Tommy Spinelli (Joe Pesci) is ordered to deliver the heads of eight late mobsters as proof of a hit, he simply jams them into a duffel bag. But an airport baggage mixup turns Tommy's crazy cargo into the surprise package of the century--and a comedy that's so funny it's criminal. With George Hamilton, Dyan Cannon, David Spade. (R) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: 2 Minutes of Fame
programme.desc: After one of his videos goes viral, a comic (Jay Pharoah) goes to Los Angeles with dreams of stand-up stardom, but his girlfriend wants him to be a stand-up guy and help raise their young son. Co-starring Katt Williams, Keke Palmer, RonReaco Lee, Deon Cole, DC Young Fly and Jess Hilarious. Directed by Leslie Small; written by Devon Shepard and Yamara Taylor.(n)

programme.title: 2 Minutes of Fame
programme.desc: After one of his videos goes viral, a comic (Jay Pharoah) goes to Los Angeles with dreams of stand-up stardom, but his girlfriend wants him to be a stand-up guy and help raise their young son. Co-starring Katt Williams, Keke Palmer, RonReaco Lee, Deon Cole, DC Young Fly and Jess Hilarious. Directed by Leslie Small; written by Devon Shepard and Yamara Taylor.(n)

programme.title: The Five-Year Engagement
programme.desc: From the duo behind "Forgetting Sarah Marshall" comes this "charming, funny" (New York magazine) romantic comedy that leaves the conventions of the genre behind. Jason Segel and Emily Blunt star as the smitten young couple whose journey down the aisle hits a series of speed bumps that threatens to tear them apart. Can they get past their respective differences and career aspirations to make it work? Rhys Ifans, Chris Pratt and Alison Brie co-star. Directed by Nicholas Stoller; written by Jason Segel & Nicholas Stoller.(n)

programme.title: Chris Gethard: Career Suicide
programme.desc: Comedian/writer/talk-show and podcast host Chris Gethard brings his critically acclaimed one-man, off-Broadway show to HBO. Taped at the Tribeca Performing Arts Center in New York City, the show highlights Gethard's comedic and highly personal reflections on depression, alcoholism, suicide...and the other funniest parts of life. Produced for HBO by Funny or Die and executive produced by Judd Apatow, Gethard finds hope and humor in the strangest of places and holds nothing back over the course of this 90-minute special, as he dives into his experiences with mental illness and psychiatry. (TVMA) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Bigger Than the Sky
programme.desc: John Corbett ("Sex and the City") plays a veteran actor who takes a talented amateur under his wing for a local community theater's production of "Cyrano de Bergerac," only to find real life imitating the play's love triangle. Co-starring Amy Smart, Sean Astin, Clare Higgins, Patty Duke, Marcus Thomas and Allan Corduner. Directed by Al Corley; written by Rodney Vaccaro.(n)

programme.title: Clifford
programme.desc: Martin Short is hilarious portraying a bratty 10-year-old boy obsessed with visiting a dinosaur-themed amusement park; Charles Grodin plays the uptight uncle who takes the wily tyke in for a week and barely lives to regret it. Mary Steenburgen and Dabney Coleman co-star in this 1994 comedy. Directed by Paul Flaherty; written by Bobby Von Hayes and Jay Dee Rock.(n)

programme.title: City Island
programme.desc: Life on City Island in the Bronx takes a hilarious series of turns for a family who get caught up in the lies they've been telling one another. Andy Garcia heads a superb cast as the family's patriarcha prison guard who has secret designs on becoming an actor. "A very funny film" (Washington Post). Co-starring Julianna Margulies, Steven Strait, with Alan Arkin and Emily Mortimer. Written and directed by Raymond De Felitta.(n)

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Not since Caddyshack have laughs on the links been so prolific! Adam Sandler stars in this outrageous comedy as a former hockey player whose mighty slap shot and penchant for brawling, profanity and chaos make him an instant legend...on the pro golf tour. Christopher McDonald, Julie Bowen, Frances Bay and Carl Weathers co-star in this 1996 hit. Directed by Dennis Dugan; written by Tim Herlihy & Adam Sandler. (PG13) (AC,AL,BN,MV).(n)

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Life takes a crazy turn when a hapless but sweet London bookstore owner finds love with an A-list Hollywood movie star. Julia Roberts and Hugh Grant light up the screen in this beloved romantic comedy from the author of "Four Weddings and a Funeral." "Blithe and exhilarating" (Entertainment Weekly). Directed by Roger Michell; written by Richard Curtis.(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: Nia Vardalos stars as a single girl who creates a major stir within her traditional Greek family by falling for a guy who has one fatal flaw--he's not Greek! John Corbett co-stars as the handsome gentleman who gets swept up in a big Greek love story in this riotous 2002 Best Original Screenplay Oscar(R) nominee that has become one of the most successful independent films ever made. The supporting cast includes Lainie Kazan, Michael Constantine, Gia Carides, Louis Mandylor with Andrea Martin. Written by Nia Vardalos, directed by Joel Zwick. (PG) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: What's Your Number?
programme.desc: What's a girl do when her number puts her in danger of being unmarriageable? For Ally, a 20-something with 20-something men to her credit, it's time to settle down and revisit the past. Anna Faris stars as the dizzy blonde who resolves to stop fooling around and get serious--by tracking down all 20 of her exes to see if she missed out on Mr. Right. Chris Evans (Captain America, The Avengers) co-stars as her musician neighbor who helps Ally in her quest. Also with Ari Graynor and Blythe Danner. Directed by Mark Mylod; screenplay by Gabrielle Allan & Jennifer Crittenden. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: The Five-Year Engagement
programme.desc: From the duo behind "Forgetting Sarah Marshall" comes this "charming, funny" (New York magazine) romantic comedy that leaves the conventions of the genre behind. Jason Segel and Emily Blunt star as the smitten young couple whose journey down the aisle hits a series of speed bumps that threatens to tear them apart. Can they get past their respective differences and career aspirations to make it work? Rhys Ifans, Chris Pratt and Alison Brie co-star. Directed by Nicholas Stoller; written by Jason Segel & Nicholas Stoller.(n)

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: The criminal underworld of New Jersey is the setting for this "ferociously energetic piece of filmmaking" (Variety). When a botched drug deal leaves a dirty cop on ice, gangster Paul Walker must dispose of the evidence. But stashing illegal guns in his basement backfires when his son's pal steals one and uses it on his abusive father. With the kid on the run, Walker realizes he must find him and recover the weapon--along with the used slugs--before anyone connects the two shootings. Cameron Bright, Vera Farmiga and Chazz Palminteri co-star. Written and directed by Wayne Kramer. (R) (AC,AL,GV).(n)

programme.title: The Comebacks
programme.desc: A floundering football coach seeks a final shot at success in this comedy that spoofs classic sports films. Lambeau Fields has earned many losses in his coaching days, but when an opportunity to lead an inept Texas team surfaces, he's ready to tackle the W's into his column! Lampooning memorable sports movies such as Rudy, Rocky and Remember the Titans this comedy about a motley group of inadequate athletes keeps the laughs coming from the kickoff. Starring David Koechner, Carl Weathers and Melora Hardin. Directed by Tom Brady; screenplay by Ed Yeager, Joey Gutierrez; story by John Aboud, Michael Colton, Adam Jay Epstein and Andrew Jacobson. (PG13) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: The Family Stone
programme.desc: A culture clash is gift-wrapped for the holidays when a tightly wound New York City career woman heads to New England to spend Christmas with her boyfriend and his free-spirited family in this comedy-drama. Everett Stone is bringing his fiancee Meredith home to meet his wacky, bohemian Stone clan. But the neurotic and uptight Meredith's habit of saying and doing the wrong thing leaves the festivities in peril...until her charming sister arrives to save the day. Claire Danes, Diane Keaton, Rachel McAdams, Dermot Mulroney, Craig T. Nelson, Sarah Jessica Parker and Luke Wilson head up a strong ensemble cast. Written and directed by Thomas Bezucha. (PG13) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Grace Unplugged
programme.desc: A Christian teen who wants to be a singer leaves home and her control-freak father--an erstwhile rocker who is now a minister--to chase her dreams of stardom in Los Angeles. AJ Michalka, James Denton, Kevin Pollak, Michael Welch and Shawnee Smith star. Written and directed by Brad J. Silverman, story by Brad J. Silverman, Brandon Rice & James Killian.(n)

programme.title: Say It Isn't So
programme.desc: For dangerously incompetent hairdresser Jo and her unlucky customer Gilly, it's love at first cut...until it turns out they may share more blood than the amount she spilled on the barbershop floor! It appears that the adopted Gilly is actually the long-lost son of Jo's venal white-trash mother (Sally Field)...or is he? In his quest to legitimize a more than brotherly love for Jo, Gilly heads from Indiana to Beaver, Oregon, and encounters a hodgepodge of hilarious characters in this randy comedy produced by the Farrelly brothers (There's Something About Mary). With Heather Graham, Chris Klein (American Pie) and Orlando Jones. (R) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: CB4
programme.desc: Chris Rock fronts a tough-talking gangster rap group with a clean-cut past in this mockumentary-style comedy. Rock brings riotous laughs as rapper Albert, a.k.a. MC Gusto, one-third of CB4 (Cell Block 4), the hottest trio to hit the rap scene. But when a film crew sets out to document their street cred, there's one big problem: the bad boys of CB4 aren't actually from the hood! With Allen Payne, Deezer D, Phil Hartman and Chris Elliott. Directed by Tamra Davis. Screenplay by Chris Rock & Nelson George and Robert LoCash. Story by Chris Rock & Nelson George. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Pale ale...band camp...warm apple pie...Stifler's mom--these are just a few of the unforgettable, undeniably twisted and utterly hilarious moments from this comedy classic about four horny high-school virgins who set their sights on scoring for the first time. Jason Biggs, Chris Klein, Natasha Lyonne, Thomas Ian Nicholas, Tara Reid, Mena Suvari and Eugene Levy head up the cast in this 1999 hit that the New York Post called, "vulgar and lewd and raunchy like you wouldn't believe, and absolutely hilarious from beginning to end." Directed by Paul Weitz; written by Adam Herz. (R) (AC,AL,N).(n)

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy and Martin Lawrence are two 1930s New Yorkers sentenced to spend the rest of their days in a Mississippi jail--all because of a bootlegging trip gone wrong. Shortly after agreeing to leave the much more hospitable Harlem to get some liquor down South, the two kids find a good time--which unfortunately leads to them being framed for the death of a swindler. Decades later, prison doesn't look nearly so bad as one would expect for these "life"-long pals. Directed by Ted Demme; written by Robert Ramsey & Matthew Stone. (R) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: Grudge Match
programme.desc: Think "Rocky" vs. "Raging Bull" and you'll get an idea of what to expect from this funny and surprisingly moving comedy starring Robert De Niro and Sylvester Stallone as bitter former boxing rivals who enter the ring as senior citizens to settle a 30-year-old score. With "Grudgement Day" fast approaching, the pair must train like never before...while deflecting old-age cracks every step of the way. Kevin Hart, Alan Arkin, Kim Basinger and Jon Bernthal co-star. Directed by Peter Segal; screenplay by Tim Kelleher and Rodney Rothman, story by Tim Kelleher. (PG13) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: A gravelly voiced fugitive from a distant planet stands as the last hope for the universe against a vicious army of soul-stealing warriors in this action-packed sequel to "Pitch Black." Vin Diesel returns as Riddick, a no-nonsense renegade who finds himself under constant attack from bounty hunters eager to take him down. But with all of the planets quickly falling under the control of the evil Necromongers and their notorious leader, it becomes clear that Riddick's knack for destruction may be mankind's only chance. Thandie Newton, Karl Urban, Colm Feore, Linus Roache, Keith David, Yorick van Wageningen, Alexa Davalos, Nick Chinlund and Judi Dench head up the top-notch ensemble cast. Written and directed by David Twohy, based on characters created by Jim & Ken Wheat.(n)

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Time is the ultimate currency in a dystopian future in which humans stop aging at 25--but die in a year unless they get more time. From out of this dark dynamic--where the rich can live forever while the working class dies--emerges hope in the person of Will Salas. Given more than a century by a rich man, Will sets out to destroy the system with help from a greedy tycoon's daughter, a quest that puts him in the crosshairs of a determined time cop. Amanda Seyfried and Justin Timberlake star in this dark tale. Cillian Murphy, Olivia Wilde and Alex Pettyfer co-star. Directed and written by Andrew Niccol. (PG13) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: Planet of the Apes (2001)
programme.desc: A plucky astronaut attempts some ill-advised monkey business and winds up on a distant planet where apes rule and humans are enslaved. Director Tim Burton's eye-popping remake of the 1968 cult classic stars Mark Wahlberg as Leo Davidson, a captain aboard a U.S. space station who goes against orders to save a training chimp. Drifting into a time warp, Davidson is sent crashing into a mysterious planet where he is captured by intelligent simians and thrown into captivity with other humans. With the help of a liberal chimp named Ari (Helena Bonham Carter), Davidson and his fellow humans attempt an escape, but the vicious ape military leader (Tim Roth) has other ideas for them! With Estella Warren, Michael Clarke Duncan, Kris Kristofferson and Paul Giamatti. (PG13) (V).(n)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: It's the 'X-Men' as they've never been seen before! Taking the comic-book movie franchise in a sensational new direction, this riveting "origins" tale explores the story of the mutant superheroes, led by Professor Charles Xavier (James McAvoy) and Erik "Magneto" Lehnsherr (Michael Fassbender), as they unite in the face of a common threat to mankind: a sadistic ex-Nazi named Sebastian Shaw who has a plan for nuclear holocaust and mutant world domination. Rose Byrne, January Jones, Oliver Platt and Kevin Bacon co-star in this "popcorn flick deluxe" (New York Daily News). Directed by Matthew Vaughn; screenplay by Ashley Edward Miller Zack Stentz and Jane Goldman Matthew Vaughn, story by Sheldon Turner and Bryan Singer. X-Men Character Likenesses TM 2011 Marvel Characters, Inc. All Rights Reserved. (PG13) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: Daylight
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone leads a desperate one-man mission to save the survivors of an accident that has left them trapped under New York City's Holland Tunnel. With oxygen perilously low and water threatening to flood the tunnel, it's up to disgruntled former rescue chief Sly to get the hardy group of commuters out in time. Amy Brenneman, Viggo Mortensen, Dan Hedaya, Jay O. Sanders, Karen Young, Claire Bloom and Barry Newman and Stan Shaw co-star in this heart-stopping action-thriller. Directed by Rob Cohen; written by Leslie Bohem. (PG13) (AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: White Oleander
programme.desc: Alison Lohman stars as a teenage girl bounced through the foster care system during her mother's incarceration for murder in this moving drama. Ingrid (Michelle Pfeiffer) poisons her lover and is sent to prison while her daughter Astrid (Lohman) is forced into the state's foster care program. Shuffled through various foster parents including a born-again Christian, a former B-movie star and an eccentric Russian, Astrid is forced to grow up quickly in several families while she also attempts to keep her mother in her life. Based on the novel by Janet Fitch. Co-starring Robin Wright Penn and Renee Zellweger. Directed by Peter Kosminsky. (PG13) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: Natalie Portman stars as an astronaut whose transcendent experiences in space leave her unhappy with her dreary life on Earth as she starts to lose her grip on reality. Jon Hamm, Dan Stevens, Zazie Beetz, Pearl Amanda Dickson and Ellen Burstyn co-star in this drama inspired by real events. Directed by Noah Hawley; written by Brian C. Brown & Elliott DiGuiseppi and Noah Hawley.(n)

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Time is the ultimate currency in a dystopian future in which humans stop aging at 25--but die in a year unless they get more time. From out of this dark dynamic--where the rich can live forever while the working class dies--emerges hope in the person of Will Salas. Given more than a century by a rich man, Will sets out to destroy the system with help from a greedy tycoon's daughter, a quest that puts him in the crosshairs of a determined time cop. Amanda Seyfried and Justin Timberlake star in this dark tale. Cillian Murphy, Olivia Wilde and Alex Pettyfer co-star. Directed and written by Andrew Niccol. (PG13) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: Little Children
programme.desc: A small town's appearance of perfection hides a sordid suburban underbelly of adultery, discontent and perversion in this "deeply resonant" (Los Angeles Times) drama from director Todd Field (In the Bedroom). Disillusioned by their lives and their marriages, young mother Sarah and stay-at-home father Brad begin a physical affair that forms the film's marrow. But while their coupling starts to unravel, the story of a convicted sex offender who has returned comes into shocking focus. Kate Winslet, Jennifer Connelly, Patrick Wilson, Jackie Earle Haley and Noah Emmerich star. Directed by Todd Field; based on the novel by Tom Perrotta; screenplay by Todd Field & Tom Perrotta. Nominated for three Oscars® in 2006: Best Actress (Winslet), Best Supporting Actor (Haley) and Best Adapted Screenplay. (R) (AC,AL,N,SC,V).(n)

programme.title: Daylight
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone leads a desperate one-man mission to save the survivors of an accident that has left them trapped under New York City's Holland Tunnel. With oxygen perilously low and water threatening to flood the tunnel, it's up to disgruntled former rescue chief Sly to get the hardy group of commuters out in time. Amy Brenneman, Viggo Mortensen, Dan Hedaya, Jay O. Sanders, Karen Young, Claire Bloom and Barry Newman and Stan Shaw co-star in this heart-stopping action-thriller. Directed by Rob Cohen; written by Leslie Bohem. (PG13) (AL,MV).(n)

Ingrid (Michelle Pfeiffer) poisons her lover and is sent to prison while her daughter Astrid (Lohman) is forced into the state's foster care program. Shuffled through various foster parents including a born-again Christian, a former B-movie star and an eccentric Russian, Astrid is forced to grow up quickly in several families while she also attempts to keep her mother in her life. Based on the novel by Janet Fitch. Co-starring Robin Wright Penn and Renee Zellweger. Directed by Peter Kosminsky. (PG13) (AC,AL,V).(n)

Jon Hamm, Dan Stevens, Zazie Beetz, Pearl Amanda Dickson and Ellen Burstyn co-star in this drama inspired by real events. Directed by Noah Hawley; written by Brian C. Brown & Elliott DiGuiseppi and Noah Hawley.(n)
