programme.desc: Time is the ultimate currency in a dystopian future in which humans stop aging at 25--but die in a year unless they get more time. From out of this dark dynamic--where the rich can live forever while the working class dies--emerges hope in the person of Will Salas. Given more than a century by a rich man, Will sets out to destroy the system with help from a greedy tycoon's daughter, a quest that puts him in the crosshairs of a determined time cop. Amanda Seyfried and Justin Timberlake star in this dark tale. Cillian Murphy, Olivia Wilde and Alex Pettyfer co-star. Directed and written by Andrew Niccol. (PG13) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: Little Children
programme.desc: A small town's appearance of perfection hides a sordid suburban underbelly of adultery, discontent and perversion in this "deeply resonant" (Los Angeles Times) drama from director Todd Field (In the Bedroom). Disillusioned by their lives and their marriages, young mother Sarah and stay-at-home father Brad begin a physical affair that forms the film's marrow. But while their coupling starts to unravel, the story of a convicted sex offender who has returned comes into shocking focus. Kate Winslet, Jennifer Connelly, Patrick Wilson, Jackie Earle Haley and Noah Emmerich star. Directed by Todd Field; based on the novel by Tom Perrotta; screenplay by Todd Field & Tom Perrotta. Nominated for three Oscars® in 2006: Best Actress (Winslet), Best Supporting Actor (Haley) and Best Adapted Screenplay. (R) (AC,AL,N,SC,V).(n)

programme.title: The Change-Up
programme.desc: Two buddies with very different lives discover that the grass isn't always greener on the other side in this comedy. Ryan Reynolds is a lady-loving slacker without a care; Jason Bateman is a married father of two who is determined to make partner in his firm. When some late-night magic causes them to switch bodies, mayhem and raunchy hijinx ensue. Leslie Mann, Olivia Wilde and Alan Arkin co-star in this hilarious take on the classic comedy routine. Directed by David Dobkin, written by Jon Lucas & Scott Moore. (R) (AC,AL,N).(n)

programme.title: Lonely Blue Night
programme.desc: The consequences of a mother's decision to leave her daughter in the care of an American homestay family are slowly unearthed. Diana Lin and Laura Faye Smith star. Directed by Johnson Cheng; written by Johnson Cheng.(n)

programme.title: Idlewild
programme.desc: "Idlewild...achieves magic" (Variety). Andre Benjamin and Antwan A. Patton--a.k.a. Andre 3000 and Big Boi of Outkast fame--star and provide the electrifying soundtrack in this musical fable set around a freewheeling Georgia nightclub in 1935. Percival (Benjamin) is an undertaker's son who lights up the piano at Church; his childhood buddy Rooster (Patton) runs the joint and performs as well...while juggling liquor, ladies and the cold-blooded thug who iced the previous owners. Co-starring Paula Patton, Terrence Howard, Faizon Love, Malinda Williams, Cicely Tyson, Macy Gray, Ben Vereen, Bruce Bruce, with Patti LaBelle and Ving Rhames. Written and directed by Bryan Barber. (R) (AC,AL,N,V).(n)

programme.title: Just My Luck
programme.desc: When a luck-blessed girl kisses a luck-deprived boy, fate reverses itself in this comedy starring Lindsay Lohan. Ashley (Lohan) has always had amazingly good luck in everything, from her career to the weather. But when she kisses accident-prone sad sack Jake (Chris Pine) at a party, suddenly things change: Jake's life takes off, and Ashley's goes down the tubes! The two are drawn to each other...but will their fates allow them to come together? With Faizon Love, Missi Pyle and the band McFly. Directed by Donald Petrie; story by Jonathan Bernstein & Mark Blackwell & James Greer and I. Marlene King; screenplay by I. Marlene King and Amy B. Harris. (PG13) (MV).(n)

programme.title: Skyline
programme.desc: Stay away from the light! An alien invasion strikes L.A., marked by the descent of brilliant blue lights from the sky; look into them and you'll be hypnotized and harvested. Eric Balfour stars as a young man desperately trying to survive and save his pregnant wife. Co-starring Scottie Thompson, Brittany Daniel with David Zayas and Donald Faison. Directed by The Brothers Strause; written by Joshua Cordes & Liam O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: This time, it may not be so elementary as Holmes and Watson match wits against devious arch-nemesis Professor Moriarty in this action-packed sequel. Robert Downey Jr. and Jude Law return as the ingenious detectives on the biggest case of their lives. When a series of bombings bring Europe to the brink of war, the world's greatest detective smells the hand of Moriarty at work. Can Holmes and his soon-to-be-married partner stop the criminal mastermind before it's too late? Noomi Rapace, Jared Harris and Eddie Marsan co-star. Directed by Guy Ritchie; written by Michele Mulroney & Kieran Mulroney. (PG13) ().(n)

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: They may be 13 years out of high school, but the 'American Pie' gang is back for their reunion. For Jim, Michelle, Oz, Kevin, Finch and their circle of friends, life isn't quite as easy and carefree as it was in 1999. Luckily, Stifler is the same as ever and this is one reunion weekend sure to be loaded with laughs, sexual shenanigans and embarrassing internet videos! "American Reunion is one last slice of pie worth having" (IGN DVD). Starring Jason Biggs, Alyson Hannigan, Chris Klein, Thomas Ian Nicholas, Tara Reid, Seann William Scott, Mena Suvari, Eddie Kaye Thomas, Jennifer Coolidge and Eugene Levy. Written and directed by Jon Hurwitz & Hayden Schlossberg, based on characters created by Adam Herz. (R) ().(n)

programme.title: Talented Mr. Ripley
programme.desc: Matt Damon stars in this "mesmerizing" (CBS-TV) psychological thriller from Oscar(R)-winning director Anthony Minghella ("The English Patient"). Damon plays a penniless young man hired to retrieve a millionaire's playboy son from Italy, but becomes intoxicated by the lush life and will do anything to hold on to it. Co-starring Gwyneth Paltrow, Jude Law, Cate Blanchett, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Jack Davenport, James Rebhorn, Sergio Rubini, Philip Baker Hall. Directed by Anthony Minghella; screenplay by Anthony Minghella, based on the novel by Patricia Highsmith. (R) (AC,AL,N,V).(n)

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers
programme.desc: "Powerful" (Variety). Clint Eastwood's acclaimed World War II saga chronicles the lives of several Marines who fought in the battle for Iwo Jima--and who planted the U.S. flag in a moment that was captured in the famous photograph that inspired the nation. On the rocky Japanese island, one of the bloodiest battles of the war was fought over the course of a month; thousands of lives were ended. But for the three surviving men who planted that famous flag, it was the beginning of a whirlwind of fleeting fame that ended as quickly as it began--and left them alone to pick up the pieces. Ryan Phillippe, Jesse Bradford and Adam Beach star. Directed by Clint Eastwood, screenplay by William Broyles, Jr. and Paul Haggis, based on the book by James Bradley with Ron Powers. (R) (AC,AL,GV).(n)

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers
programme.desc: "Powerful" (Variety). Clint Eastwood's acclaimed World War II saga chronicles the lives of several Marines who fought in the battle for Iwo Jima--and who planted the U.S. flag in a moment that was captured in the famous photograph that inspired the nation. On the rocky Japanese island, one of the bloodiest battles of the war was fought over the course of a month; thousands of lives were ended. But for the three surviving men who planted that famous flag, it was the beginning of a whirlwind of fleeting fame that ended as quickly as it began--and left them alone to pick up the pieces. Ryan Phillippe, Jesse Bradford and Adam Beach star. Directed by Clint Eastwood, screenplay by William Broyles, Jr. and Paul Haggis, based on the book by James Bradley with Ron Powers. (R) (AC,AL,GV).(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Two young scammers take advantage of a government policy allowing contracts to private businesses to become international gun runners in this hilarious, fact-based adventure. Jonah Hill and Miles Teller are outrageously funny as the ill-suited duo who find themselves rolling in both dough and danger while trafficking guns to the U.S. military during the Iraq War. "Nimble, gripping and terrific...with plenty of laughs" (Variety). Ana de Armas and Bradley Cooper co-star. Directed by Todd Phillips ("The Hangover" films); screenplay by Stephen Chin and Todd Phillips & Jason Smilovic, based on the Rolling Stone article "Arms and the Dudes" by Guy Lawson. (R) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Two young scammers take advantage of a government policy allowing contracts to private businesses to become international gun runners in this hilarious, fact-based adventure. Jonah Hill and Miles Teller are outrageously funny as the ill-suited duo who find themselves rolling in both dough and danger while trafficking guns to the U.S. military during the Iraq War. "Nimble, gripping and terrific...with plenty of laughs" (Variety). Ana de Armas and Bradley Cooper co-star. Directed by Todd Phillips ("The Hangover" films); screenplay by Stephen Chin and Todd Phillips & Jason Smilovic, based on the Rolling Stone article "Arms and the Dudes" by Guy Lawson. (R) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: If you enjoyed the terror that Jordan Peele cooked up in 2017's ''Get Out,'' then you'd better fasten your seatbelt for this ''unforgettable dance with the devil'' (Richard Roeper, Chicago Sun-Times). Oscar(R) winner Lupita Nyong'o (''12 Years a Slave'') stars as a young woman who returns with her family to a beach town where she suffered a terrifying experience as a child. The past soon comes back to haunt the family with the arrival of four home invaders who have a horrifying secret. Winston Duke, Elisabeth Moss and Tim Heidecker co-star. Written and directed by Jordan Peele.(n)

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: If you enjoyed the terror that Jordan Peele cooked up in 2017's ''Get Out,'' then you'd better fasten your seatbelt for this ''unforgettable dance with the devil'' (Richard Roeper, Chicago Sun-Times). Oscar(R) winner Lupita Nyong'o (''12 Years a Slave'') stars as a young woman who returns with her family to a beach town where she suffered a terrifying experience as a child. The past soon comes back to haunt the family with the arrival of four home invaders who have a horrifying secret. Winston Duke, Elisabeth Moss and Tim Heidecker co-star. Written and directed by Jordan Peele.(n)

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: The unseen maniac of the Universal monsters canon returns to invisible life in this frightening 2020 reboot. Golden Globe(R)-winner Elisabeth Moss (TV's "The Handmaid's Tale" and "Mad Men") stars as a young woman who escapes her abusive relationship with an optics engineer only to have him fake his death and return as the titular terror--who makes it his sole mission to terrorize her. An "expertly told, horrifying story of an abusive relationship filtered through the lens of a classic horror movie monster" (The Wrap). Co-starring Aldis Hodge, Storm Reid, Harriet Dyer, Michael Dorman and Oliver Jackson-Cohen. Directed by Leigh Whannell; screenplay and screen story by Leigh Whannell.(n)

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: The unseen maniac of the Universal monsters canon returns to invisible life in this frightening 2020 reboot. Golden Globe(R)-winner Elisabeth Moss (TV's "The Handmaid's Tale" and "Mad Men") stars as a young woman who escapes her abusive relationship with an optics engineer only to have him fake his death and return as the titular terror--who makes it his sole mission to terrorize her. An "expertly told, horrifying story of an abusive relationship filtered through the lens of a classic horror movie monster" (The Wrap). Co-starring Aldis Hodge, Storm Reid, Harriet Dyer, Michael Dorman and Oliver Jackson-Cohen. Directed by Leigh Whannell; screenplay and screen story by Leigh Whannell.(n)

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes II
programme.desc: "The hills are alive again with the sound of mutants" (The Hollywood Reporter). Following the hit 2006 remake of The Hills Have Eyes comes this shocking sequel that leaves an unprepared squadron of National Guard trainees in the deadly desert lair of the murderous miscreants. Battling the rugged terrain and their clashing personalities, the overmatched recruits are slaughtered in grisly fashion one by one as they try to escape the horrifying creatures--residents of the remote region who were left hideously deformed by nuclear testing. Michael McMillian, Jacob Vargas, Flex Alexander and Jessica Stroup star. Directed by Martin Weisz, based on characters created by Wes Craven, written by Wes Craven & Jonathan Craven. (R) (AC,AL,GV,RP).(n)

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2
programme.desc: The Creeper returns for more bloody mayhem in this pulse-pounding sequel that finds the supernatural creature hunting down a bus-load of high-school teens. Can a farmer and his son stop the carnage? Starring Ray Wise, Eric Nenninger, Garikayi Mutambirwa, Nicki Aycox, Marieh Delfino, Diane Delano, Thom Gossom, Jr., Billy Aaron Brown, Lena Cardwell, Al Santos, Travis Schiffner, Kasan Butcher, Josh Hammond with Justin Long and Jonathan Breck. Written and directed by Victor Salva, based on characters created by Victor Salva.(n)

programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: They're here...and they're hungry! Joe Dante ("Gremlins") directed this 1978 cult classic about a school of bloodthirsty, grade-A, government-approved piranha that wreak havoc on a beautiful resort. It's up to a detective and a local man to stop the frenzied fish. Starring Bradford Dillman, Heather Menzies, Kevin McCarthy, Keenan Wynn, Barbara Steele and Dick Miller. Directed by Joe Dante; screenplay by John Sayles, story by Richard Robinson and John Sayles.(n)

programme.title: Open Water 2: Adrift
programme.desc: A yacht party takes a terrifying turn for the worse when the revelers take a swim without putting the ladder down. Unable to get back on board, the group finds themselves facing a desperate struggle for survival. Starring Susan May Pratt, Richard Speight Jr., Niklaus Lange, Ali Hillis with Cameron Richardson and Eric Dane. Directed by Hans Horn; written by Adam Kreutner & Dave Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
programme.desc: Huh huh huh. Heh-heh. See America's favorite teenage buffoons go bonkers when somebody steals their TV set-and their purpose in life! In this hilarious animated feature, B & B hit the road and practically demolish the nation with their stoopid antics. From the mighty redwoods to the fruited plain to Washington, D.C., no one is spared-not the FBI, not motherhood, not even Chelsea Clinton. By the time the boys are finished, America is well done (heh heh). (PG13) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: A Family Thing
programme.desc: Robert Duvall and James Earl Jones are superb in this touching tale about a white Southerner who goes on a journey to Chicago after learning that he has an African American half-brother. Directed by Richard Pearce; screenplay by Billy Bob Thornton & Tom Epperson.(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: Five hundred years in the future, the dumbing-down of America reaches the level of a national disaster. When "average" Joe and Rita, human guinea pigs in an Army experiment, are frozen and accidentally abandoned, they thaw out half a millennium later in a world populated by idiots. While smarter people have hesitated to reproduce, the dumbest citizens have bred like crazy, resulting in a society in which former Army man Joe and former prostitute Rita are the smartest people! They must try to get back to the comparatively civilized present in this "merciless, spot-on" (Los Angeles Times) satire. With Luke Wilson, Maya Rudolph and Dax Shepard. Directed by Beavis and Butt-Head creator Mike Judge ("Office Space"). Story by Mike Judge, screenplay by Mike Judge & Etan Cohen. (R) (AL,BN,MV).(n)

programme.title: Hackers
programme.desc: Hack the planet! Tech-savvy teen hackers identify a scam orchestrated by a corporate computer pro in this sci-fi film. Jonny Lee Miller stars as Dade, a.k.a. Crash Override, a new Manhattan student who quickly connects with a gifted group of high-school hackers--including the feisty Kate Libby (Angelina Jolie)--but courts trouble with a corporate rogue who attempts to frame the teens for his computer crimes. Also with Fisher Stevens and Lorraine Bracco. Directed by Iain Softley; written by Rafael Moreu. (PG13) (AC,AL,BN,V).(n)

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Brad Pitt stars in this visually stunning sci-fi epic, playing an astronaut traveling across the solar system in search of his long-missing father, whose doomed expedition now threatens humanity. Tommy Lee Jones, Ruth Negga, Liv Tyler and Donald Sutherland co-star. Directed by James Gray; screenplay by James Gray & Ethan Gross.(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: "The surfing footage is stupendous" (New York Post) in this adrenaline-filled action-thriller about an FBI agent who goes undercover to catch a gang of bank-robbing surfers led by Patrick Swayze. Keanu Reeves plays the Fed from the Midwest who learns to hang ten like a native Californian while trying to bring the surfers and their mystical guru/ringleader (Swayze). Also with Gary Busey and Lori Petty. Directed by Kathryn Bigelow; screenplay by W. Peter Iliff, story by Rick King & W. Peter Iliff. (R) (AL,BN,V).(n)

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes II
programme.desc: "The hills are alive again with the sound of mutants" (The Hollywood Reporter). Following the hit 2006 remake of The Hills Have Eyes comes this shocking sequel that leaves an unprepared squadron of National Guard trainees in the deadly desert lair of the murderous miscreants. Battling the rugged terrain and their clashing personalities, the overmatched recruits are slaughtered in grisly fashion one by one as they try to escape the horrifying creatures--residents of the remote region who were left hideously deformed by nuclear testing. Michael McMillian, Jacob Vargas, Flex Alexander and Jessica Stroup star. Directed by Martin Weisz, based on characters created by Wes Craven, written by Wes Craven & Jonathan Craven. (R) (AC,AL,GV,RP).(n)

programme.title: A Kiss Before Dying
programme.desc: An ambitious youth bent on success begins dating the twin sister of a college girlfriend who committed suicide. Jonathan (Matt Dillon) and Ellen (Sean Young) fall deeply in love, but while he settles into a nice job working for her tycoon-father, Ellen becomes increasingly convinced her sister's death may have been foul play. Max von Sydow, Diane Ladd and James Russo co-star in this gripping remake of the 1956 classic. Written for the screen and directed by James Dearden; based on the novel by Ira Levin. (R) (AC,AL,BN,V).(n)

programme.title: A Kiss Before Dying
programme.desc: An ambitious youth bent on success begins dating the twin sister of a college girlfriend who committed suicide. Jonathan (Matt Dillon) and Ellen (Sean Young) fall deeply in love, but while he settles into a nice job working for her tycoon-father, Ellen becomes increasingly convinced her sister's death may have been foul play. Max von Sydow, Diane Ladd and James Russo co-star in this gripping remake of the 1956 classic. Written for the screen and directed by James Dearden; based on the novel by Ira Levin. (R) (AC,AL,BN,V).(n)

programme.title: The Last Kiss
programme.desc: An immature man nearing the age of 30 faces an unexpected crisis when his girlfriend gets pregnant--and a girl still in college starts pursuing him! At the same time, his friends and his parents are experiencing problems of their own in this "unusually perceptive" (Hollywood Reporter) comedy-drama. Zach Braff plays the confused father-to-be. With Jacinda Barrett, Casey Affleck, Rachel Bilson, Michael Weston, Eric Christian Olsen, Marley Shelton, Harold Ramis, Blythe Danner and Tom Wilkinson. Directed by Tony Goldwyn; screenplay by Paul Haggis. (R) (AC,AL,BN).(n)

programme.title: The Last Kiss
programme.desc: An immature man nearing the age of 30 faces an unexpected crisis when his girlfriend gets pregnant--and a girl still in college starts pursuing him! At the same time, his friends and his parents are experiencing problems of their own in this "unusually perceptive" (Hollywood Reporter) comedy-drama. Zach Braff plays the confused father-to-be. With Jacinda Barrett, Casey Affleck, Rachel Bilson, Michael Weston, Eric Christian Olsen, Marley Shelton, Harold Ramis, Blythe Danner and Tom Wilkinson. Directed by Tony Goldwyn; screenplay by Paul Haggis. (R) (AC,AL,BN).(n)

programme.title: Ruby Sparks
programme.desc: To author Calvin Weir-Fields, Ruby Sparks is the perfect woman: sweet, smart, fun, sexy, and with only one drawback: she's a figment of his imagination. As the focus of the Salinger-esque Calvin's long-awaited new novel, Ruby gets his creative juices flowing...until she steps off the page and into his life for real. Controlling her via his writing, Calvin soon learns that even though he holds the puppet strings, it doesn't help them avoid the inevitable pitfalls of any relationship. Paul Dano and Zoe Kazan star in this "gently touching metaphorical drama about the real essence of love" (Entertainment Weekly). Antonio Banderas, Annette Bening, Steve Coogan and Elliott Gould co-star. Directed by Jonathan Dayton & Valerie Faris; written by Zoe Kazan. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Ruby Sparks
programme.desc: To author Calvin Weir-Fields, Ruby Sparks is the perfect woman: sweet, smart, fun, sexy, and with only one drawback: she's a figment of his imagination. As the focus of the Salinger-esque Calvin's long-awaited new novel, Ruby gets his creative juices flowing...until she steps off the page and into his life for real. Controlling her via his writing, Calvin soon learns that even though he holds the puppet strings, it doesn't help them avoid the inevitable pitfalls of any relationship. Paul Dano and Zoe Kazan star in this "gently touching metaphorical drama about the real essence of love" (Entertainment Weekly). Antonio Banderas, Annette Bening, Steve Coogan and Elliott Gould co-star. Directed by Jonathan Dayton & Valerie Faris; written by Zoe Kazan. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Say It Isn't So
programme.desc: For dangerously incompetent hairdresser Jo and her unlucky customer Gilly, it's love at first cut...until it turns out they may share more blood than the amount she spilled on the barbershop floor! It appears that the adopted Gilly is actually the long-lost son of Jo's venal white-trash mother (Sally Field)...or is he? In his quest to legitimize a more than brotherly love for Jo, Gilly heads from Indiana to Beaver, Oregon, and encounters a hodgepodge of hilarious characters in this randy comedy produced by the Farrelly brothers (There's Something About Mary). With Heather Graham, Chris Klein (American Pie) and Orlando Jones. (R) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: Say It Isn't So
programme.desc: For dangerously incompetent hairdresser Jo and her unlucky customer Gilly, it's love at first cut...until it turns out they may share more blood than the amount she spilled on the barbershop floor! It appears that the adopted Gilly is actually the long-lost son of Jo's venal white-trash mother (Sally Field)...or is he? In his quest to legitimize a more than brotherly love for Jo, Gilly heads from Indiana to Beaver, Oregon, and encounters a hodgepodge of hilarious characters in this randy comedy produced by the Farrelly brothers (There's Something About Mary). With Heather Graham, Chris Klein (American Pie) and Orlando Jones. (R) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: Grace Unplugged
programme.desc: A Christian teen who wants to be a singer leaves home and her control-freak father--an erstwhile rocker who is now a minister--to chase her dreams of stardom in Los Angeles. AJ Michalka, James Denton, Kevin Pollak, Michael Welch and Shawnee Smith star. Written and directed by Brad J. Silverman, story by Brad J. Silverman, Brandon Rice & James Killian.(n)

programme.title: Grace Unplugged
programme.desc: A Christian teen who wants to be a singer leaves home and her control-freak father--an erstwhile rocker who is now a minister--to chase her dreams of stardom in Los Angeles. AJ Michalka, James Denton, Kevin Pollak, Michael Welch and Shawnee Smith star. Written and directed by Brad J. Silverman, story by Brad J. Silverman, Brandon Rice & James Killian.(n)

programme.title: City of God
programme.desc: Nominated for four Oscars(R), including Best Director, this "breathtaking and terrifying" (Roger Ebert) film follows the divergent lives of two young men from a hellish slum in Rio de Janeiro. "The film is seductive, disturbing, enthralling--a trip to hell that gives the passengers a great ride" (Time magazine). Starring Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino da Hora, Jonathan Haagensen, Phellipe Haagensen, Douglas Silva, Daniel Zettel and Seu Jorge. Directed by Fernando Meirelles, co-directed by Katia Lund; screenplay by Braulio Mantovani, based on the novel by Paulo Lins.(n)

programme.title: Munich
programme.desc: "Four stars" (Roger Ebert). Eleven Israeli athletes were murdered at the 1972 Olympics in Munich--this is the story of what happened next. From director Steven Spielberg comes this gripping thriller about the five men hired by the Israeli government for a top-secret mission to assassinate the 11 Palestinian terrorists responsible. Eric Bana, Daniel Craig, Ciaran Hinds, Mathieu Kassovitz, Hanns Zischler and Geoffrey Rush star in this "absorbing" (Roger Ebert) film about tragedy, revenge and the vicious cycle of violence in the Middle East. Directed by Steven Spielberg, based on the book Vengeance by George Jonas, screenplay by Tony Kushner and Eric Roth. Nominated for five 2005 Oscars(R) including Best Picture and Best Director (Spielberg). (R) (BN,GV).(n)

programme.title: The Whole Ten Yards
programme.desc: Hit man Bruce Willis and frazzled dentist Matthew Perry re-team for more laughs and more gunplay in this rib-tickling sequel that goes the extra yard when it comes to laughs. Picking up where The Whole Nine Yards left off, contract killer Jimmy (Willis) has traded in his six-shooter for an apron while wife Jill handles the killing. Meanwhile, nerve-wracked dental denizen Oz (Perry) is busy driving his pregnant wife nuts. For once, Oz has good reason to be nervous: mob boss Laszlo Gogolak is out on parole--and he holds Oz and Jimmy responsible for the death of his son! Amanda Peet, Kevin Pollak and Natasha Henstridge co-star. Directed by Howard Deutch; screenplay by George Gallo, based on characters created by Mitchell Kapner; story by Kapner. (PG13) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: White Oleander
programme.desc: Alison Lohman stars as a teenage girl bounced through the foster care system during her mother's incarceration for murder in this moving drama. Ingrid (Michelle Pfeiffer) poisons her lover and is sent to prison while her daughter Astrid (Lohman) is forced into the state's foster care program. Shuffled through various foster parents including a born-again Christian, a former B-movie star and an eccentric Russian, Astrid is forced to grow up quickly in several families while she also attempts to keep her mother in her life. Based on the novel by Janet Fitch. Co-starring Robin Wright Penn and Renee Zellweger. Directed by Peter Kosminsky. (PG13) (AC,AL,V).(n)

programme.title: Glass
programme.desc: Heroes and villains collide with thrilling results in this explosive third installment in M. Night Shyamalan's superhero trilogy (following "Unbreakable" and "Split"). When fate brings "unbreakable" David Dunn (Bruce Willis) and Kevin Wendell Crumb a.k.a. "The Horde" (James McAvoy) into the same mental hospital as the devious Mr. Glass (Samuel L. Jackson), it's a confrontation 20 years in the making. When the two villains escape, it's up to Dunn, now known as the Overseer, to stop them before their diabolical plans come to fruition. Also with Anya Taylor-Joy and Sarah Paulson. Written & directed by M. Night Shyamalan.(n)

programme.title: Birds of Prey: Harley Quinn
programme.desc: Harley Quinn (Margot Robbie) is back for more freaky fun and malevolent mayhem, as she dumps the Joker and teams up with Huntress, Black Canary and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from Gotham City crime czar Roman Sionis. Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Jurnee Smollett-Bell, Rosie Perez, Chris Messina and Ewan McGregor co-star in this stylish caper. Directed by Cathy Yan; written by Christina Hodson.(n)

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: Delivering a stunning, Academy Award(R)-winning performance, Joaquin Phoenix is "masterful" (Film Threat) as Arthur Fleck, a spindly, greasy-hired clown and aspiring comedian who begins a slow, dark transformation into Batman's murderous, maniacal archenemy, Joker. "A movie that borders on genius" (Rex Reed). Co-starring Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy, Brett Cullen, Marc Maron and Douglas Hodge. Directed by Todd Phillips; written by Todd Phillips & Scott Silver, based on characters from DC.(n)

programme.title: Downhill
programme.desc: An idyllic ski vacation in the Alps takes a dark turn for a couple after a near-death experience forces them to reconsider their relationship. Julia Louis-Dreyfus and Will Ferrell star in this biting remake of the acclaimed Swedish film Force Majeure that finds the couple rocked by their reaction to nearly being killed in an avalanche. "A character-driven comedy working its way through a painful and real conflict" (Film Threat). Directed by Nat Faxon & Jim Rash; screenplay by Jesse Armstrong and Nat Faxon & Jim Rash.(n)

programme.title: City of God
programme.desc: Nominated for four Oscars(R), including Best Director, this "breathtaking and terrifying" (Roger Ebert) film follows the divergent lives of two young men from a hellish slum in Rio de Janeiro. "The film is seductive, disturbing, enthralling--a trip to hell that gives the passengers a great ride" (Time magazine). Starring Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino da Hora, Jonathan Haagensen, Phellipe Haagensen, Douglas Silva, Daniel Zettel and Seu Jorge. Directed by Fernando Meirelles, co-directed by Katia Lund; screenplay by Braulio Mantovani, based on the novel by Paulo Lins.(n)

programme.title: CB4
programme.desc: Chris Rock fronts a tough-talking gangster rap group with a clean-cut past in this mockumentary-style comedy. Rock brings riotous laughs as rapper Albert, a.k.a. MC Gusto, one-third of CB4 (Cell Block 4), the hottest trio to hit the rap scene. But when a film crew sets out to document their street cred, there's one big problem: the bad boys of CB4 aren't actually from the hood! With Allen Payne, Deezer D, Phil Hartman and Chris Elliott. Directed by Tamra Davis. Screenplay by Chris Rock & Nelson George and Robert LoCash. Story by Chris Rock & Nelson George. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: CB4
programme.desc: Chris Rock fronts a tough-talking gangster rap group with a clean-cut past in this mockumentary-style comedy. Rock brings riotous laughs as rapper Albert, a.k.a. MC Gusto, one-third of CB4 (Cell Block 4), the hottest trio to hit the rap scene. But when a film crew sets out to document their street cred, there's one big problem: the bad boys of CB4 aren't actually from the hood! With Allen Payne, Deezer D, Phil Hartman and Chris Elliott. Directed by Tamra Davis. Screenplay by Chris Rock & Nelson George and Robert LoCash. Story by Chris Rock & Nelson George. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: 40 Days and 40 Nights
programme.desc: In the wake of a disastrous relationship, a young designer at a dot.com company decides to give up sex for Lent. But 40 days can seem pretty long when you suddenly meet the woman of your dreams. Josh Hartnett and Shannyn Sossamon star in this riotous romantic comedy. Also with Vinessa Shaw, Paulo Costanzo and Griffin Dunne. "It's very funny, terrifically lively and...surprisingly tender" (The Wall Street Journal). Directed by Michael Lehmann; written by Robert Perez.(n)

programme.title: 40 Days and 40 Nights
programme.desc: In the wake of a disastrous relationship, a young designer at a dot.com company decides to give up sex for Lent. But 40 days can seem pretty long when you suddenly meet the woman of your dreams. Josh Hartnett and Shannyn Sossamon star in this riotous romantic comedy. Also with Vinessa Shaw, Paulo Costanzo and Griffin Dunne. "It's very funny, terrifically lively and...surprisingly tender" (The Wall Street Journal). Directed by Michael Lehmann; written by Robert Perez.(n)

programme.title: Beginners
programme.desc: "A highly personal exploration into the mysteries of love" (Hollywood Reporter). Ewan McGregor stars in this unique drama as a man struggling to come to terms with his ideals about love and relationships. In the wake of his mother's death, Oliver (McGregor) is stunned by his father's announcement that he is gay. Winner of the 2011 Oscar(R) for Best Supporting Actor, Christopher Plummer shines as the dying father who experiences life as he'd always imagined...while shaking Oliver's feelings about what love is as he enters a relationship of his own. Melanie Laurent, Goran Visnjic, Kai Lennox, Mary Page Keller and Keegan Boos co-star. Written and directed by Mike Mills. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Beginners
programme.desc: "A highly personal exploration into the mysteries of love" (Hollywood Reporter). Ewan McGregor stars in this unique drama as a man struggling to come to terms with his ideals about love and relationships. In the wake of his mother's death, Oliver (McGregor) is stunned by his father's announcement that he is gay. Winner of the 2011 Oscar(R) for Best Supporting Actor, Christopher Plummer shines as the dying father who experiences life as he'd always imagined...while shaking Oliver's feelings about what love is as he enters a relationship of his own. Melanie Laurent, Goran Visnjic, Kai Lennox, Mary Page Keller and Keegan Boos co-star. Written and directed by Mike Mills. (R) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Cruel Intentions
programme.desc: Affluent Manhattan stepsiblings Sebastian and Kathryn cook up a vicious scheme in this 'wickedly entertaining' ('Variety') update of 'Dangerous Liaisons.' When Sebastian meets the virginal Annette, he puts his beloved car on the line for the ultimate wager--if he can seduce Annette, he gets to bed Kathryn. But when love gets in the way, things take a dark turn for all three. Sarah Michelle Gellar, Ryan Phillippe, Reese Witherspoon and Selma Blair star. Directed by Roger Kumble; screenplay by Roger Kumble. (R) (AC,AL,BN,MV).(n)

programme.title: Cruel Intentions
programme.desc: Affluent Manhattan stepsiblings Sebastian and Kathryn cook up a vicious scheme in this 'wickedly entertaining' ('Variety') update of 'Dangerous Liaisons.' When Sebastian meets the virginal Annette, he puts his beloved car on the line for the ultimate wager--if he can seduce Annette, he gets to bed Kathryn. But when love gets in the way, things take a dark turn for all three. Sarah Michelle Gellar, Ryan Phillippe, Reese Witherspoon and Selma Blair star. Directed by Roger Kumble; screenplay by Roger Kumble. (R) (AC,AL,BN,MV).(n)

programme.title: In Secret
programme.desc: A sexually repressed young woman trapped in a loveless marriage with her sickly cousin embarks on an illicit affair with his friend. Elizabeth Olsen and Oscar Isaac heat up this steamy adaptation of Emile Zola's classic tale. Tom Felton and Jessica Lange co-star. Directed by Charlie Stratton; screenplay by Charlie Stratton, based on the stage play ''Therese Raquin'' by Neal Bell and the novel by Emile Zola.(n)

programme.title: In Secret
programme.desc: A sexually repressed young woman trapped in a loveless marriage with her sickly cousin embarks on an illicit affair with his friend. Elizabeth Olsen and Oscar Isaac heat up this steamy adaptation of Emile Zola's classic tale. Tom Felton and Jessica Lange co-star. Directed by Charlie Stratton; screenplay by Charlie Stratton, based on the stage play ''Therese Raquin'' by Neal Bell and the novel by Emile Zola.(n)

programme.title: Lonely Blue Night
programme.desc: The consequences of a mother's decision to leave her daughter in the care of an American homestay family are slowly unearthed. Diana Lin and Laura Faye Smith star. Directed by Johnson Cheng; written by Johnson Cheng.(n)

programme.title: The Last King of Scotland
programme.desc: Forest Whitaker delivers an overpowering, Oscar(R)-winning performance as Ugandan dictator Idi Amin in this drama that witnesses his brutal rule through the eyes of a young Scottish doctor. James McAvoy co-stars as the young man who becomes Amin's personal physician and closest confidante, enjoying the many perks of the job even as the ruler shows an increasingly evil side. Whitaker is sensational, capturing the dictator's magnetism, charm and dark side in a portrayal that made him the overwhelming winner of the Best Actor award at the 2006 Academy Awards(R). Also with Kerry Washington, Simon McBurney and Gillian Anderson. Directed by Kevin Macdonald; screenplay by Peter Morgan and Jeremy Brock; based on the novel by Giles Foden. (R) (AC,AL,GV,SC).(n)

programme.title: Si
programme.desc: After a baseball game, an Asian American boy navigates microaggression with his friends through seemingly innocent jokes and games. Starring Ki Hong Lee, Rollin Atkinson and Cam Perrin. Directed by Thomas Kim; written by Thomas Kim.(n)

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Mel Gibson brings to brilliant life the incredible story of Pfc. Desmond T. Doss whose fight to do his part in World War II began at home where he was maligned for enlisting as a pacifist--and then on the battlefield at Okinawa where his heroics as a medic would earn him the Congressional Medal of Honor. Andrew Garfield stars as this real-life hero whose valor never required a weapon in spite of the bloody madness all around him. Richard Pyros, Jacob Warner, Milo Gibson, Darcy Bryce, Sam Worthington and Hugo Weaving co-star. Directed by Mel Gibson; screenplay by Andrew Knight, story by Robert Schenkkan. (R) (AC,AL,BN,GV).(n)

programme.title: The Bee Gees: How Can You Mend A Broken Heart
programme.desc: Brothers first. The band forever. Directed by Academy Award(R)nominated filmmaker Frank Marshall, the film follows the Brothers Gibb: Barry, Maurice, and Robin, better known as the Bee Bees, from their early fame in the 1960s and meteoric rise to a storied career in which they wrote more than 1,000 songs, including 20 number one hits. Through footage of their electrifying concerts, never-before-seen recording sessions, home videos, and TV appearances, the film is an intimate exploration of the Bee Gee's journey, featuring interviews with Barry Gibb, the sole living brother, as well as archival interviews with Robin and Maurice, Eric Clapton, Noel Gallagher, Nick Jonas, Chris Martin, Justin Timberlake, among others.(n)

programme.title: Dirty Dancing: Havana Nights
programme.desc: In this follow-up to the classic film "Dirty Dancing," an American teen moves with her family to Cuba in 1958 where she falls for a local youth who instructs her in the art of Cuban dance and romance. Starring Diego Luna, Romola Garai, Sela Ward, John Slattery, Jonathan Jackson, January Jones and Mika Boorem. Plus, don't miss a special appearance by original "Dirty Dancing" star Patrick Swayze. Directed by Guy Ferland; screenplay by Boaz Yakin and Victoria Arch, story by Kate Gunzinger and Peter Sagal.(n)

programme.title: The Bee Gees: How Can You Mend A Broken Heart
programme.desc: Brothers first. The band forever. Directed by Academy Award(R)nominated filmmaker Frank Marshall, the film follows the Brothers Gibb: Barry, Maurice, and Robin, better known as the Bee Bees, from their early fame in the 1960s and meteoric rise to a storied career in which they wrote more than 1,000 songs, including 20 number one hits. Through footage of their electrifying concerts, never-before-seen recording sessions, home videos, and TV appearances, the film is an intimate exploration of the Bee Gee's journey, featuring interviews with Barry Gibb, the sole living brother, as well as archival interviews with Robin and Maurice, Eric Clapton, Noel Gallagher, Nick Jonas, Chris Martin, Justin Timberlake, among others.(n)

programme.title: Get On Up
programme.desc: He began life as a poor kid from rural South Carolina...but by the time he was done, he was only one thing: the "Godfather of Soul." Chadwick Boseman electrifies as the legendary James Brown in this exhilarating bio-pic that chronicles his rough upbringing, his rise to superstardom, and all of the larger-than-life mayhem and unforgettable music he produced along the way. Co-starring Nelsan Ellis, Dan Aykroyd, Viola Davis, Lennie James and Fred Melamed. Directed by Tate Taylor; screenplay by Jez Butterworth & John-Henry Butterworth, story by Steven Baigelman and Jez Butterworth & John-Henry Butterworth. (PG13) (AC,AL,N,V).(n)

programme.title: The Bee Gees: How Can You Mend A Broken Heart
programme.desc: Brothers first. The band forever. Directed by Academy Award(R)nominated filmmaker Frank Marshall, the film follows the Brothers Gibb: Barry, Maurice, and Robin, better known as the Bee Bees, from their early fame in the 1960s and meteoric rise to a storied career in which they wrote more than 1,000 songs, including 20 number one hits. Through footage of their electrifying concerts, never-before-seen recording sessions, home videos, and TV appearances, the film is an intimate exploration of the Bee Gee's journey, featuring interviews with Barry Gibb, the sole living brother, as well as archival interviews with Robin and Maurice, Eric Clapton, Noel Gallagher, Nick Jonas, Chris Martin, Justin Timberlake, among others.(n)

programme.title: Queen & Slim
programme.desc: A black couple's first date turns into a nightmare after a minor traffic stop spirals out of control and the man kills a cop in self-defense, forcing the pair to go on the run. This gripping and powerful drama stars Daniel Kaluuya, Jodie Turner-Smith, Bokeem Woodbine, Chloe Sevigny, Flea and Indya Moore. Directed by Melina Matsoukas, screenplay by Lena Waithe, story by James Frey and Lena Waithe.(n)

programme.title: Lonely Blue Night
programme.desc: The consequences of a mother's decision to leave her daughter in the care of an American homestay family are slowly unearthed. Diana Lin and Laura Faye Smith star. Directed by Johnson Cheng; written by Johnson Cheng.(n)

programme.title: Murder on Middle Beach 04: Reasonable Doubts
programme.desc: Finale. With the ten-year anniversary of his mother's death approaching, Madison leaves no stone unturned in his quest for the truth  despite concerns that his documentary may be doing more harm than good. As Madison presses on, there are surprising roadblocks to his investigation.(n)

programme.title: Just Mercy
programme.desc: Michael B. Jordan stars as Harvard-educated attorney Bryan Stevenson, who goes to Alabama in the 1980s to defend the poor, and fights to prove the innocence of a death row inmate (Jamie Foxx). Rob Morgan, Tim Blake Nelson, Rafe Spall and Brie Larson co-star in this inspirational true story. Directed by Destin Daniel Cretton; written by Destin Daniel Cretton & Andrew Lanham, based on the book by Bryan Stevenson.(n)

programme.title: 40 Years a Prisoner
programme.desc: In 1978, the escalating conflict between Philadelphia leadership and the Black liberation group MOVE led to one of the most controversial police shootouts in American historyand a son's four-decade-long fight to free his parents. The 1978 confrontation, which claimed the life of Officer James Ramp and saw unarmed MOVE member Delbert Africa nearly beaten to death, made headlines and culminated in murder charges and prison sentences of 30 to 100 years for nine MOVE members. This timely documentary chronicles the tireless fight by Mike Africa Jr., despite countless setbacks, to ensure the release of his parents and other MOVE members while illuminating the injustice under Police Commissioner-turned-Mayor Frank Rizzo and the media's role in exacerbating the conflict.(n)

programme.title: Porno Para Principiantes (Porno for Newbies)
programme.desc: An amateur filmmaker who's about to get married falls for a porn star when he's hired by a mobster to direct a pornographic version of the classic horror film ''The Bride of Frankenstein.'' Martin Piroyansky, Nicolas Furtado, Daniel Araoz, Carolina Manica, Roberto Suarez, Nuria Flo star. Directed by Carlos Ameglio; written by Leonel D'Agostino, Carlos Ameglio, Bruno Cancio.(n)

programme.title: Jerry Garcia: It's Not My Weekend
programme.desc: Head into the energetic, hilarious world of funny-man Jerry Garcia, the rising Latino comic and a single father of three. Recorded in front of a live audience, this special reveals the California-raised comedian's superior ability to make fun of himself, his parenting style, his efforts in dating and more.(n)

programme.title: The Cost of Winning 01: Episode 1
programme.desc: Only one week out from their season opener in Miami, Baltimore's St. Frances Academy Panthers prepare for their grueling upcoming national schedule. Lacking adequate facilities and forced out of their local Maryland private-school league after every opposing team forfeited games against them, the team hits the streets to practice while reflecting on what football could mean for their futures.(n)

programme.title: Industry 05: Learned Behaviour
programme.desc: As Pierpoint is shaken by a former employee's scathing expose, Eric goes offsite for the day, prompting an unauthorized Gus to cover trades from his desk, while Harper maneuvers her way into a meeting with one of Eric's coveted, disgruntled ex-clients. But when Gus and Harper both cross the line, they risk compromising their futures at the bank. Following Robert's successful first business trip, Clement treats him to a special outing, while Yasmin works her connections to land a major client meeting.(n)

programme.title: Like Water For Chocolate
programme.desc: Unable to marry because of an ancient family tradition, a woman expresses her passion for her lover through preparing delectable dishes. Based on the acclaimed best-selling book, this erotic tale of forbidden love stars Marco Leonardi, Lumi Cavazos, Regina Torne, Ada Carrasco and Mario Ivan Martinez. Directed by Alfonso Arau; screenplay by Laura Esquivel, based on her novel.(n)

programme.title: Baby God
programme.desc: Once hailed as a miracle worker, Dr. Quincy Fortier's secret is now out. Formerly a renowned Nevada fertility specialist, he has become best known for deceiving countless women struggling to conceive by using his own sperm--without their knowledge or consent--to impregnate them. Featuring intimate and revealing interviews with many of Fortier's children, the film takes a close, nuanced look at the lasting effects that Fortier's misdeeds have had--and will continue to have--on the women he victimized, as well as their children and generations to come. The result is a stunning expose of the egregious, once undetectable truths about Fortier's medical practice, as well as his alleged sexual abuse of family members.(n)

programme.title: HBO Latino Presents: A Tiny Audience Episode 2
programme.desc: In this series of intimate music specials, Latin musicians reveal a personal secret to the "tiny" audience before them and perform a pair of songs that are meaningful to them.(n)

programme.title: Casi Famoso (Almost Famous)
programme.desc: After his power goes out, an actor has to go to a coffee shop and audition via Skype for a famous director in this comical short. Starring Diego Ruiz, Aurelien Wiik, Amalia Kassai, Daniela Estay. Directed by Gonzalo Diaz; screenplay by Gonzalo Diaz and Diego Ruiz.(n)

programme.title: De Lo Mio
programme.desc: After nearly a decade apart, three estranged siblings reunite after their father's death in order to settle his estate in Santiago, Dominican Republic. Dante has never known any other place but Santiago while his half-sisters Carolina and Rita are ride-or-die New Yorkers, but all three arrive to find a run-down version of the loving house they remember of their youth. Starring Sasha Merci, Darlene Demorizi and Hector Anibal. Written & directed by Diana Peralta.(n)

programme.title: Sin Cielo
programme.desc: Teens pursue love in a Mexican border town where violence may be inescapable. David Gurrola, Fenessa Pineda and Dylan Bruno star in this short film. Written and directed by Jianna Maarten Saada.(n)

programme.title: El Pacto (The Pact)
programme.desc: After a woman learns that her diabetic daughter is about to die, she takes part in a dark ritual in which a mysterious man offers her a pact to save the girl's life. This intense psychological thriller stars Belen Rueda, Mireia Oriol, Dario Grandinetti, Antonio Duran Morris and Josean Bengoetxea. Directed by David Victori; written by David Victori and Jordi Vallejo.(n)

programme.title: Real Sports with Bryant Gumbel 283
programme.desc: Segments: A surprising look at how psychedelic drugs can be used to treat depression, addiction and anxiety in athletes with head injuries; explorer Victor Vescovo has spent his fortune uncovering the deepest, most unknown parts of our planet; Meet some of sports' biggest super fans who are agonizing over being locked out of stadiums due to the pandemic.(n)

programme.title: Abuelos (Grandpas)
programme.desc: Three old friends having a hard time adapting to the changing job market decide to start a daycare center. But is society ready for three grandpas running a babysitting business? Carlos Iglesias, Roberto Alvarez, Ramon Barea and Mercedes Sampietro star. Directed by Santiago Requejo; written by Javier Lorenzo and Santiago Requejo.(n)

programme.title: Torn Apart: Separated at the Border
programme.desc: This eye-opening, heartfelt documentary tells the stories of two mothers seeking to be reunited with their children after being separated at the U.S.-Mexico border.(n)

programme.title: A Boy Called Sailboat
programme.desc: Whimsical fable of a quirky little boy who finds a guitar and magically writes a song that has a profound effect on the world. Starring Julian Atocani Sanchez, Noel Gugliemi, Elizabeth De Razzo, Lew Temple, Jake Busey and J.K. Simmons. Written and directed by Cameron Nugent.(n)

programme.title: Dolittle
programme.desc: Robert Downey Jr. stars as the eccentric veterinarian who can talk to animals in this delightful film for the whole family. After Queen Victoria falls ill, the doctor sets off on a quest to find a cure, accompanied by a young apprentice and a menagerie of exotic animals. Co-starring Antonio Banderas, Michael Sheen, Harry Collett, Emma Thompson, Rami Malek, John Cena, Kumail Nanjiani, Octavia Spencer, Tom Holland, Ralph Fiennes, Selena Gomez, Marion Cotillard. Directed by Stephen Gaghan; screenplay by Stephen Gaghan and Dan Gregor & Doug Mand, screen story by Thomas Shepherd.(n)

programme.title: The Cost of Winning 04: Episode 4
programme.desc: As the final game of regular season looms, the Panthers' seniors are struck by the realization that their time at St. Frances is rapidly coming to a close and major life changes lie ahead. Before National Signing Day, Panthers' coaches aid in solidifying college plans and help place those still uncommitted, while surprises  some good, some less than  arise for the players.(n)

programme.title: His Dark Materials 12: Tower of the Angels
programme.desc: Will and Lyra make a plan, unaware of the dangers or the cost involved.(n)

programme.title: Entre Nos: The Winners
programme.desc: After winning a stand-up comedy competition held in conjunction with the New York Latino Film Festival, comedians Mark Viera and Alex Carabano perform in front of a live audience in this edition of HBO Latino's Entre Nos stand-up specials. In these sets, Viera talks about our smartphone life vs. "the beeper life" of his younger days, getting in trouble from innocent social media posts, and the "delete delete box," while Carabano shares anecdotes about being short, astrology and dating, and having a family that doubted his heterosexuality.(n)

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: This time, it may not be so elementary as Holmes and Watson match wits against devious arch-nemesis Professor Moriarty in this action-packed sequel. Robert Downey Jr. and Jude Law return as the ingenious detectives on the biggest case of their lives. When a series of bombings bring Europe to the brink of war, the world's greatest detective smells the hand of Moriarty at work. Can Holmes and his soon-to-be-married partner stop the criminal mastermind before it's too late? Noomi Rapace, Jared Harris and Eddie Marsan co-star. Directed by Guy Ritchie; written by Michele Mulroney & Kieran Mulroney. (PG13) ().(n)

programme.title: Alabama Snake
programme.desc: It's a chilling Southern Gothic tale of an attempted murder by rattlesnake. This documentary explores the mystifying events leading up to October 4, 1991, when an unusual violent crime was reported in Scottsboro, Alabama: Darlene Summerford accused her husband, Pentecostal preacher Glenn Summerford, of forcing her hand into a rattlesnake bed in an attempt to kill her. Employing dramatic re-creations and interviews with those who knew Summerford best, the documentary weaves between the past and present to unravel the details of the controversial investigation and trial that unfolded.(n)

programme.title: Euphoria: Trouble Don't Last Always
programme.desc: In the aftermath of being left by Jules at the train station and relapsing, Rue celebrates Christmas.(n)

programme.title: One Way or Another 09: Steal My Heart
programme.desc: Hache goes out on a promising date with Iker, whom she met at the underground party, while Belen's latest dream job paves the way for an interesting opportunity. Later, after both of their evenings take unexpected turns, Hache's injury provides them with a much-needed distraction.(n)

programme.title: The Rock & Roll Hall of Fame 2020 Inductions
programme.desc: Six of the most influential acts in music history--Depeche Mode, The Doobie Brothers, Whitney Houston, Nine Inch Nails, The Notorious B.I.G., and T. Rex--join a pantheon of legends in The Rock & Roll Hall of Fame 2020 Inductions. This star-studded two-hour special of electrifying vignettes spotlights each of the inductee's incredible contributions and impact. This year's edition also features some of the biggest names in music and entertainment, including Luke Bryan, Sean "Diddy" Combs, Miley Cyrus, Billy Gibbons, Dave Grohl, Don Henley, Jennifer Hudson, Billy Idol, Iggy Pop, Alicia Keys, Adam Levine, Chris Martin, Lin-Manuel Miranda, Brad Paisley, Bruce Springsteen, St. Vincent, Ringo Starr, Gwen Stefani, Charlize Theron, Nancy Wilson, and more.(n)

programme.title: His Dark Materials 12: Tower of the Angels
programme.desc: Will and Lyra make a plan, unaware of the dangers or the cost involved.(n)

programme.title: Entre Nos 05: The Series
programme.desc: The world's top Latino comics come together for an hour of stand-up comedy in this fifth installment of 'Entre Nos.' Comedians Ramon Rivas, Gina Brillon, Jesus Sepulveda and Nick Guerra share uproarious personal stories in front of a live audience at the Alex Theater in Glendale, CA.(n)

programme.title: Real Sports with Bryant Gumbel 283
programme.desc: Segments: A surprising look at how psychedelic drugs can be used to treat depression, addiction and anxiety in athletes with head injuries; explorer Victor Vescovo has spent his fortune uncovering the deepest, most unknown parts of our planet; Meet some of sports' biggest super fans who are agonizing over being locked out of stadiums due to the pandemic.(n)

programme.title: Muralla (The Goalkeeper)
programme.desc: In this thought-provoking thriller about human trafficking, a washed-up former goalkeeper has a change of heart after kidnapping a girl to pay for his son's medical treatment. Starring Fernando Arze Echalar, Cristian Mercado, Pablo Echarri. Directed by Gory Patino; written by Camila Urioste, Fernando Arze Echalar, Gory Patino, Fernanda Rossi.(n)

programme.title: El Astronauta (The Astronaut)
programme.desc: A man suffering from dementia asks his son to help him fly to the moon so he can say goodbye to his late wife. Manuel Trotta and Luigi Sciamanna star in this award-winning short film. Written and directed by Manuel Trotta.(n)

programme.title: La Gallina Turuleca (Turu, The Wacky Hen)
programme.desc: A misfit hen who can't lay eggs suddenly discovers she has a great talent: she can understand humans and has a beautiful singing voice! Voices in this animated comedy include Eva Hache and Jose Mota. Directed by Victor Monigote, Eduardo Gondell; written by Juan Pablo Buscarini, Eduardo Gondell and Pablo E. Bossi.(n)

programme.title: Desde el principio (From the Top)
programme.desc: In this short film, two voice actors dealing with a shared tragedy strike up a conversation in a darkened recording studio. With Andrea Velasco and Eric Robledo. Directed by Miguel J. Soliman; screenplay by Nicolas Giacobone.(n)

programme.title: Miriam Miente (Miriam Lies)
programme.desc: A shy, bi-racial teenager wants to invite a boy she met online to her quinceanerabut she fears telling her mother that he's black. Dulce Rodriguez, Carolina Rohana, Pachy Mendez, Ana Maria Arias and Vicente Santos star in this sensitive coming-of-age drama. Written and directed by Natalia Cabral and Oriol Estrada.(n)

programme.title: Long Gone By
programme.desc: Ana Alvarez is a single mother from Nicaragua living in Indiana with her teenage daughter, Izzy. When a routine check in leads to a deportation order, Ana decides to risk everything in a last chance effort to pay Izzy's college tuition--giving her daughter the chance at a life she never had. Starring Erica Munoz, Izzy, Hau'ula, Sherryl Despres, Ethan Dawson, Ramona DuBarry, Tony DeMil and Tim Bensch. Directed by Andrew Morgan; screenplay by David Wappel & Andrew Morgan, story by Andrew Morgan.(n)

programme.title: Torn Apart: Separated at the Border
programme.desc: This eye-opening, heartfelt documentary tells the stories of two mothers seeking to be reunited with their children after being separated at the U.S.-Mexico border.(n)

programme.title: Pecado Original (Original Sin)
programme.desc: A sexually frustrated housewife seduces an artist who visits her house, only to be interrupted by her prudish husband, who then tries to win her back. This romantic comedy stars Maia Nikiphoroff, Cesar Di Bello, Alejandro Torres Menchaca, Licia Alonso, Tomas Perez. Directed by Jean Lee; written by Jean Lee & Maia Nikiphoroff.(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Hard-charging businessman Nicolas Cage gets a magical Christmas Eve chance to experience life as a family man with his college sweetheart in this heartfelt holiday romance. Tea Leoni co-stars in this moving tale that recalls "It's a Wonderful Life." Also with Jeremy Piven, Saul Rubinek and Don Cheadle. Directed by Brett Ratner; written by David Diamond & David Weissman. (PG13) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Between The World And Me
programme.desc: Based on the 2018 adaptation and staging of Ta-Nehisi Coates' book at the Apollo Theater, this HBO Special features powerful readings from the book with documentary and archival footage, and animation. Focusing on the author's experiences growing up in inner-city Baltimore, the narrative explores Coates' bold notion that American society structurally supports white supremacy.(n)

programme.title: Que te Juegas (Get Her If You Can)
programme.desc: A struggling stand-up comedian gets mixed up in the madcap schemes of two spoiled siblings who are fighting for control of their family's shipping business. Starring Leticia Dolera, Amaia Salamanca, Javier Rey, Miriam Hernandez, Daniel Perez Prada, Brays Efe, with Santiago Segura. Directed by Ines De Leon; written by Astrid Gil-Casares, Rafa Russo, Breixo Corral, Pablo Alen.(n)

programme.title: Que te Juegas (Get Her If You Can)

Starring Leticia Dolera, Amaia Salamanca, Javier Rey, Miriam Hernandez, Daniel Perez Prada, Brays Efe, with Santiago Segura. Directed by Ines De Leon; written by Astrid Gil-Casares, Rafa Russo, Breixo Corral, Pablo Alen.(n)

programme.desc: Lyra ignores the alethiometer's advice leading to dangerous consequences.(n)

programme.title: La Leyenda Negra
programme.desc: An El Salvadorian teen attending high school in California becomes involved with a group of activist immigrants fighting deportation after the government moves to end Temporary Protected Status. Monica Betancourt, Kailei Lopez, Irlanda Moreno, Justin Avila, and Juan Reynoso star in this drama. Written and directed by Patricia Vidal Delgado.(n)

programme.desc: Join comedians Ian Lara and Chris Estrada for a West Coast and East Coast showdown in this HBO Latino comedy special.(n)

programme.title: Entre Nos: LA Meets NY
programme.desc: Join comedians Ian Lara and Chris Estrada for a West Coast and East Coast showdown in this HBO Latino comedy special.(n)

programme.desc: Finale. With the ten-year anniversary of his mother's death approaching, Madison leaves no stone unturned in his quest for the truth  despite concerns that his documentary may be doing more harm than good. As Madison presses on, there are surprising roadblocks to his investigation.(n)

programme.title: Industry 05: Learned Behaviour
programme.desc: As Pierpoint is shaken by a former employee's scathing expose, Eric goes offsite for the day, prompting an unauthorized Gus to cover trades from his desk, while Harper maneuvers her way into a meeting with one of Eric's coveted, disgruntled ex-clients. But when Gus and Harper both cross the line, they risk compromising their futures at the bank. Following Robert's successful first business trip, Clement treats him to a special outing, while Yasmin works her connections to land a major client meeting.(n)

programme.title: The Cost of Winning 02: Episode 2
programme.desc: With week two's home opener against Simeon fast approaching, the #2 seeded Panthers use the game as an opportunity to prepare for their highly anticipated upcoming showdown against top-ranked Mater Dei. As top players manage high expectations, Baltimore City Council president Brandon Scott gives the Panthers a pep talk before they take the field for the most important match-up of the season  and possibly their high school careers.(n)

programme.title: The Cost of Winning 02: Episode 2
programme.desc: With week two's home opener against Simeon fast approaching, the #2 seeded Panthers use the game as an opportunity to prepare for their highly anticipated upcoming showdown against top-ranked Mater Dei. As top players manage high expectations, Baltimore City Council president Brandon Scott gives the Panthers a pep talk before they take the field for the most important match-up of the season  and possibly their high school careers.(n)

programme.title: Pecado Original (Original Sin)
programme.desc: A sexually frustrated housewife seduces an artist who visits her house, only to be interrupted by her prudish husband, who then tries to win her back. This romantic comedy stars Maia Nikiphoroff, Cesar Di Bello, Alejandro Torres Menchaca, Licia Alonso, Tomas Perez. Directed by Jean Lee; written by Jean Lee & Maia Nikiphoroff.(n)

programme.title: Pedro Capo: En Letra de Otro
programme.desc: Award-winning Puerto Rican singer-songwriter Pedro Capo honors a variety of leading Latin artists he grew up with by performing a selection of their hits--songs we know and love--in his own style. This special features covers of Selena, Chayanne, Jon Secada, Jerry Rivera, Luis Miguel, Calle 13, OV7, Fey, and Donato y Estefano plus commentary from Pedro himself on his musical influences, life and more. (TV14) (AC,AL).(n)

programme.title: Transhood
programme.desc: Directed by Sharon Liese, this documentary is an inspiring chronicle of the lives of four young people  aged 4, 7, 12, and 15 at the start of filming  and their families as they navigate growing up transgender in America's heartland. Moving and thought-provoking, the film follows these courageous families from a politically and religiously conservative Kansas City community over the course of five years, exploring how they struggle and stumble through parenting, and how the kids are challenged and transformed as they experience the complexity of their identities and redefine "coming of age.".(n)

programme.title: How to Make an American Quilt
programme.desc: As a granddaughter prepares for marriage, a group of women sew profound stories of love into a quilt in this drama based on the novel. Before young Finn (Winona Ryder) walks down the aisle, she spends a summer with her beloved grandmother to gain some perspective on marriage. As the grandmother and her friends gather to quilt, the ladies stitch their own amorous recollections into each personal panel. Co-starring Maya Angelou, Anne Bancroft, Ellen Burstyn, Kate Capshaw, Loren Dean, Samantha Mathis, Dermot Mulroney, Kate Nelligan, Derrick O'Connor, Jean Simmons, Lois Smith, Rip Torn and Mykelti Williamson, Alfre Woodard. Directed by Jocelyn Moorhouse; screenplay by Jane Anderson; based on the novel by Whitney Otto.(n)

programme.title: Lino, Una Aventura de Siete Vidas
programme.desc: The fur flies in this animated comedy from Brazil about a kids' party entertainer who is tired of being made fun of for wearing a cat costume. But when he goes to a wizard to change his life, he's accidentally turned into an actual giant feline! Featuring the voices of Selton Mello, Paolla Oliveira and Dira Paes. Written and directed by Rafael Ribas.(n)

programme.title: Gente de Zona: En Letra de Otro
programme.desc: In this music special featuring Latin Grammy(R) winners Gente de Zona, the acclaimed Cuban duo performs classic hits in a stunning performance along the majestic Havana shoreline.(n)

programme.title: Gina Brillon: Easily Offended
programme.desc: Actress-writer-comedian Gina Brillon shines in this hilarious half-hour stand-up special. In this show, Brillon couples her magnetic stage presence with all-too relatable content  from the charm of Southern accents to the nuisance of people who talk too much; from the excitement of cruise-ship buffets to the pros of "marrying up.".(n)

programme.title: La Leyenda Negra
programme.desc: An El Salvadorian teen attending high school in California becomes involved with a group of activist immigrants fighting deportation after the government moves to end Temporary Protected Status. Monica Betancourt, Kailei Lopez, Irlanda Moreno, Justin Avila, and Juan Reynoso star in this drama. Written and directed by Patricia Vidal Delgado.(n)

programme.title: Muralla (The Goalkeeper)
programme.desc: In this thought-provoking thriller about human trafficking, a washed-up former goalkeeper has a change of heart after kidnapping a girl to pay for his son's medical treatment. Starring Fernando Arze Echalar, Cristian Mercado, Pablo Echarri. Directed by Gory Patino; written by Camila Urioste, Fernando Arze Echalar, Gory Patino, Fernanda Rossi.(n)

programme.title: Real Sports with Bryant Gumbel 283
programme.desc: Segments: A surprising look at how psychedelic drugs can be used to treat depression, addiction and anxiety in athletes with head injuries; explorer Victor Vescovo has spent his fortune uncovering the deepest, most unknown parts of our planet; Meet some of sports' biggest super fans who are agonizing over being locked out of stadiums due to the pandemic.(n)

programme.title: Heroes cotidianos 05: The Gang
programme.desc: After spending his youth enmeshed in violence, Carlos Cruz changed his direction in life and formed an organization to build peaceful alternatives to gangs, rescuing others from a life of crime.(n)

programme.title: De Lo Mio
programme.desc: After nearly a decade apart, three estranged siblings reunite after their father's death in order to settle his estate in Santiago, Dominican Republic. Dante has never known any other place but Santiago while his half-sisters Carolina and Rita are ride-or-die New Yorkers, but all three arrive to find a run-down version of the loving house they remember of their youth. Starring Sasha Merci, Darlene Demorizi and Hector Anibal. Written & directed by Diana Peralta.(n)

programme.title: Pecado Original (Original Sin)
programme.desc: A sexually frustrated housewife seduces an artist who visits her house, only to be interrupted by her prudish husband, who then tries to win her back. This romantic comedy stars Maia Nikiphoroff, Cesar Di Bello, Alejandro Torres Menchaca, Licia Alonso, Tomas Perez. Directed by Jean Lee; written by Jean Lee & Maia Nikiphoroff.(n)

programme.title: Baby God
programme.desc: Once hailed as a miracle worker, Dr. Quincy Fortier's secret is now out. Formerly a renowned Nevada fertility specialist, he has become best known for deceiving countless women struggling to conceive by using his own sperm--without their knowledge or consent--to impregnate them. Featuring intimate and revealing interviews with many of Fortier's children, the film takes a close, nuanced look at the lasting effects that Fortier's misdeeds have had--and will continue to have--on the women he victimized, as well as their children and generations to come. The result is a stunning expose of the egregious, once undetectable truths about Fortier's medical practice, as well as his alleged sexual abuse of family members.(n)

programme.title: Huracan
programme.desc: An aspiring MMA ¿ghter who suffers from Multiple Personality Disorder delves into his mental illness with a pioneering but troubled psychologist. Cassius Corrigan and Yara Martinez star. Written and directed by Cassius Corrigan.(n)

programme.title: His Dark Materials 12: Tower of the Angels
programme.desc: Will and Lyra make a plan, unaware of the dangers or the cost involved.(n)

programme.title: Midnight Family
programme.desc: Described by the New York Times as "terrifying and exhilarating," this documentary takes you on a harrowing ride with the Ochoa family who owns one of Mexico City's many private ambulance companies. With the camera right in the back of the ambulance, the film follows the emergency workers as they race rival ambulances to the scene, tend to the injured and live on a ragged edge of danger and poverty. A nominee for the Grand Jury Prize at the 2019 Sundance Film Festival. Directed by Luke Lorentzen.(n)

programme.title: One Way or Another 10: Without Masks
programme.desc: Season One Finale. When Oli's mother arrives unannounced, Belen is forced to reevaluate everything she thought she knew about her roommate. After receiving several urgent messages from her ex, Hache finally agrees to meet him face-to-face. Later, Hache discovers the true value of her injury.(n)

programme.desc: In this series of intimate music specials, Latin musicians reveal a personal secret to the "tiny" audience before them and perform a pair of songs that are meaningful to them.(n)

programme.title: Harina (Flour)
programme.desc: Amid Venezuela's economic crisis, a middle-class working man runs into a conflict with his unemployed mother who wants him to buy flour for her birthday cake. Starring Juliana Cuervos, Gabriel Aguero, Moises Berroteran, Raul Burgos, Marco Polo, Mercedes Garcia, Jorge Marquez and Stefany Bolivar. Written and directed by Joanna Cristina Nelson.(n)

programme.title: Los Futbolismos (The Footballist)
programme.desc: In this fun adaptation of the popular Spanish children's-book series, the members of a hapless school soccer team need to win one of their next three games or their club will be disbanded. Starring Julio Bohigas-Couto, Milene Mayer, Marcos Milara. Directed by Miguel Angel Lamata; written by Roberto Santiago, Pablo Fernandez Vazquez, Miguel Angel Lamata.(n)

programme.title: Abuelos (Grandpas)
programme.desc: Three old friends having a hard time adapting to the changing job market decide to start a daycare center. But is society ready for three grandpas running a babysitting business? Carlos Iglesias, Roberto Alvarez, Ramon Barea and Mercedes Sampietro star. Directed by Santiago Requejo; written by Javier Lorenzo and Santiago Requejo.(n)

programme.title: HBO Latino Presents: A Tiny Audience Episode 1
programme.desc: In this episode, Sebastian Yatra, who always sleeps with socks on, performs "No Hay Nadie Mas" and "Robarte un Beso"; Natti Natasha, who doesn't know how to swim, performs "Dutti Love" and "La Mejor Version De Mi"; plus, Juanes performs "La Camisa Negra" and "Island in the Sun"; and Jackie Cruz performs "Melly 16" and covers Amy Winehouse's "Valerie.".(n)

programme.title: Alabama Snake
programme.desc: It's a chilling Southern Gothic tale of an attempted murder by rattlesnake. This documentary explores the mystifying events leading up to October 4, 1991, when an unusual violent crime was reported in Scottsboro, Alabama: Darlene Summerford accused her husband, Pentecostal preacher Glenn Summerford, of forcing her hand into a rattlesnake bed in an attempt to kill her. Employing dramatic re-creations and interviews with those who knew Summerford best, the documentary weaves between the past and present to unravel the details of the controversial investigation and trial that unfolded.(n)

programme.title: Los Lobos
programme.desc: Two young boys who have come to the U.S. from Mexico with their mother use their imaginations to pass the time in their tiny apartment while dreaming of going to Disneyland in this award-winning film. Starring Maximiliano Najar Marquez, Leonardo Najar Marquez, Martha Reyes Arias, Cici Lau, Johnson T. Lau. Directed by Samuel Kishi Leopo; written by Samuel Kishi Leopo, Luis Briones, Sofia Gomez-Cordova.(n)

programme.title: Heroes cotidianos 05: The Gang
programme.desc: After spending his youth enmeshed in violence, Carlos Cruz changed his direction in life and formed an organization to build peaceful alternatives to gangs, rescuing others from a life of crime.(n)

programme.title: El Pacto (The Pact)
programme.desc: After a woman learns that her diabetic daughter is about to die, she takes part in a dark ritual in which a mysterious man offers her a pact to save the girl's life. This intense psychological thriller stars Belen Rueda, Mireia Oriol, Dario Grandinetti, Antonio Duran Morris and Josean Bengoetxea. Directed by David Victori; written by David Victori and Jordi Vallejo.(n)

programme.title: Murder on Middle Beach 04: Reasonable Doubts

programme.title: Rock of Ages
programme.desc: A small-town girl (Julianne Hough) with big-town dreams of being a singer comes to Los Angeles in 1987. There, she falls for an aspiring rocker (Diego Boneta), who helps her get a job as a waitress at the Bourbon Room, a notorious club that the mayor's uptight wife is trying to shut down. You'll have nothin' but a good time with the music of Def Leppard, Journey, Twisted Sister and more in this adaptation of the head-banging hit musical. The all-star cast includes Russell Brand, Paul Giamatti, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Malin Akerman, Mary J. Blige with Alec Baldwin and Tom Cruise. Directed by Adam Shankman; screenplay by Justin Theroux and Chris D'Arienzo and Allan Loeb, based on the musical 'Rock of Ages' written by Chris D'Arienzo. (PG13) (AC,AL,MV).(n)

programme.title: Rock of Ages

programme.title: The Bee Gees: How Can You Mend A Broken Heart
programme.desc: Brothers first. The band forever. Directed by Academy Award(R)nominated filmmaker Frank Marshall, the film follows the Brothers Gibb: Barry, Maurice, and Robin, better known as the Bee Bees, from their early fame in the 1960s and meteoric rise to a storied career in which they wrote more than 1,000 songs, including 20 number one hits. Through footage of their electrifying concerts, never-before-seen recording sessions, home videos, and TV appearances, the film is an intimate exploration of the Bee Gee's journey, featuring interviews with Barry Gibb, the sole living brother, as well as archival interviews with Robin and Maurice, Eric Clapton, Noel Gallagher, Nick Jonas, Chris Martin, Justin Timberlake, among others.(n)

programme.title: The Bee Gees: How Can You Mend A Broken Heart
programme.desc: Brothers first. The band forever. Directed by Academy Award(R)nominated filmmaker Frank Marshall, the film follows the Brothers Gibb: Barry, Maurice, and Robin, better known as the Bee Bees, from their early fame in the 1960s and meteoric rise to a storied career in which they wrote more than 1,000 songs, including 20 number one hits. Through footage of their electrifying concerts, never-before-seen recording sessions, home videos, and TV appearances, the film is an intimate exploration of the Bee Gee's journey, featuring interviews with Barry Gibb, the sole living brother, as well as archival interviews with Robin and Maurice, Eric Clapton, Noel Gallagher, Nick Jonas, Chris Martin, Justin Timberlake, among others.(n)

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: "You sank my Battleship!" The fun family board game is brought to thrilling life in this full-throttle action-adventure. Taylor Kitsch (TV's "Friday Night Lights") stars as a rebellious young man who, when he's not butting heads with his sexy girlfriend's Admiral father, rockets up the ranks to join his brother on board a destroyer that may be mankind's last hope against an armada of hostile outer-space visitors. Alexander Skarsgard, Rihanna, Brooklyn Decker, Tadanobu Asano and Liam Neeson co-star in this non-stop thrillride packed with "impressive visual effects" (Hollywood Reporter). Directed by Peter Berg; written by Joe Hoeber & Erich Hoeber, based on Hasbro's "Battleship." (PG13) (AL,V).(n)
